Sñan rgyud mdo sde rin chen sgron ma :teachings on the significance of the ʻOm ma tri mu ye sa le ʾduʾ formula of Bon /orally transmitted to Sprul-sku Blo-Idan-sñiṅ-po. Collected biographical material about Lo-chen Rin-chen-bzan-po and his subsequent reembodiments.
The autobiography of Rig-ʼdzin Chos-rgyal-rdo-rje, together with his Phyag chen źal gdams and works from his visionary cycle O rgyan mkhaʼ ʼgro nor lhaʼi sgrub thabs.

Gene Smith.

title: Dpal ldan ʾBrug-paʾi rgyun gyi thugs dam rtsa gsum bstan sruṅ dam can rgya mtshoʾi mchod bstod gtor bsṅos phrin bcol gyi rim pa yid bźin nor bu dbaṅ gi rgyal poʾi phreṅ ba srid źiʾi dgra las rnam rgyal źes bya ba bźugs so.

title: Calendrical calculation and astrological texts from Ladakh.

Dpal Mgon bstan sruṅ yoṅs rdzogs kyi thugs dam bskoṅ źiṅ ñams chags bśags pa bstan ʾgror phan paʾi dpal ster.
Bde chen źiṅ bkod kyi mdo bsdus pa theg pa chen po.
Gcod tshogs sgrub skor.

title: Thos paʾi phan yon Luṅ gi ʾod zer źes bya ba bźugs so /[Gser Dgon Saṅs-rgyas-bstan-ʾdzin gyis bris]

title: Mchod sdoṅ ʾDzam gliṅ rgyaṅ [sic] gcig rten Gtsug lag khaṅ daṅ bcas paʾi dkar chag Thar gliṅ rgya mtshor bgrod paʾi gru rdziṅs Byin rlabs kyi baṅ mdzod :a detailed account of the funeral ceremonies and entombment rites of the Fifth Dalai Lama Ṅag-dbaṅ-blo-bzaṅ-rgya-mtsho /by Sde-srid Saṅs-rgyas-rgya-mtsho.
author: Saṅs-rgyas-rgya-mtsho,Sde-srid,1653-1705.

title: Bla ma dgoṅs pa ʾdus pa las Rgyud gsuṅ rdo rje gcod pa bźugs so.
author: Saṅs-rgyas-gliṅ-pa,Gter-ston,1340-1396.

title: Thub paʾi skyes rabs sdom tshig bźugs so.
Rta mgrin gsaṅ sgrub kyi chos skor las glud chog mchog sbyin rgya mtsho bźugs so /[Theʾu-kan Chos-kyi-ñi-maʾi gsuṅ].
author: Thʾu-bkwan Blo-bzaṅ-chos-kyi-ñi-ma,1737-1802.

title: Bod miʾi ʾdas mchod =Tibetan ceremonies of the dead /by Thupten Sangay.
pub: Dharamsala, H.P.:Library of Tibetan Works and Archives, Headquarters of H.H. the Dalai Lama,c1974.
author: Thupten Sangay,1912-

title: Skar ʾbyuṅ rtsis kyi sṅon ʾgro lag len ñer mkho man ṅag bsdus pa daṅ ʾBras rtsis rab dkar chu śel me loṅ zla thoʾi dgoṅs don gasla byed mthoṅ ba don ldan blo dman mun bsel ces bya ba bźugso /[Khu-nu Sman-miṅ Saṅs-rgyas-chos-ʾphel daṅ Tshe-dbaṅ-miṅ pas sug bris mdzad pa].
author: Saṅs-rgyas-chos-ʾphel,1928-

title: ʾPhags pa De bźin gśegs pa bdun gyi sṅon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa źes bya ba Theg pa chen poʾi mdo bźugs so.
Gsuṅ ṅag lam gyi rim paʾi smon lam Dṅos grub ñin byed ʾdren paʾi śiṅ rta źes bya ba bźugs so /[Kun-dgaʾ-rgyal-mtshan gyis mdzad]
author: Sde-gźuṅ Kun-dgaʾ-rgyal-mtshan.1885-1952.

title: Bsre ʾphoʾi ʾkhrul ʾkhor gyi rtsa tshig rtsa ʾgrel daṅ bcas pa bźugs so.
author: Śākya-rin-chen,Rje Mkhan-po,1710-1759.

title: Chos mṅon pa mdzod kyi spyi don dkaʾ gnas legs par bśad pa /Rje-btsun Chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan dpal bzaṅ pos mdzad paʾi nor bu baṅ mdzod ces bya ba.
author: Se-ra Rje-btsun Chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan,1469-1546.

title: ʾDir ʾGog sñoms brgal lan gyi rnam bźag, Rje-btsun raṅ gi gsuṅ rigs zin bris su bgyis pa bźugs yod, rjes su thod rgal yaṅ bźugs yod.
author: Se-ra Rje-btsun Chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan,1469-1546.

title: Yon tan gźir gyur maʾi bsdus ʾgrel ʾJam-mgon-bla-ma-dgyes-paʾi mchod sprin źes bya ba bźugs so /[Śes-rab-rgya-mtshos sbyar]
author: Saṅs-rgyas-rgya-mtsho,Rdo-bis Dge-bśes.

title: Skabs daṅ poʾi [-Brgyad paʾi] mthaʾ dpyod /Rje-btsun Chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan dpal bzaṅ poʾi gsuṅ zin bris su bkod pa bźugs so.
author: Se-ra Rje-btsun Chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan,1469-1546.

title: Sgrol-ma Dkar Sṅon gyi bstod pa daṅ gzuṅs bcas bźugs so.
Slob-dpon-chen-po Padma-ʼbyuṅ-gnas kyi rnam thar gsol ʼdebs bźugs so /[Mṅaʼ-bdag Ñan Ñi-ma-ʼod-zer gyis mdzad]
author: Ñaṅ-ral Ñi-ma-ʼod-zer,1124-1192.

title: Rtsis kyi man ṅag Ñin mor byed paʾi snaṅ ba /[Dharma-śrīs bgyis]
author: Smin-gliṅ Lo-chen Dharma-śrī,1654-1717.

title: Chos spyod kyi rim pa Thar lam rab gsal /Smin-gliṅ Lo-chen Dharma-śrī.
author: Smin-gliṅ Lo-chen Dharma-śrī,1654-1717.

title: Bslab pa yoṅs su sbyoṅ ba gźi gsum gyi cho ga Thar gliṅ du bgrod paʾi gru chen źes bya ba bźugs so /[Dharmas sbyar]
author: Smin-gliṅ Lo-chen Dharma-śrī,1654-1717.

title: Grub thob chen poʾi bkaʾ babs smyuṅ gnas cho ga bźugso /Sñiṅ-rjeʾi-dpal gyis spel]
author: Sñiṅ-rjeʾi dpal.

title: ʾPhags-pa De-bźin-gśegs-paʾi gtsug tor nas byuṅ baʾi gdugs dkar po can gźan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po mchog tu grub pa.

Dam paʼi chos rin po che ʼPhags-paʼi yul du ji ltar dar ba i tshul gsal bar ston pa Dgos ʼdod kun ʼbyuṅ źes bya ba bźugs so =A religio-sociological history of Mahayana Buddhism in India /Tā-ra-nā-tha.
author: Tāranātha,Jo-naṅ-pa,1575-

title: Dbus-smyon Kun-dgaʾ-bzaṅ-poʾi Mgur ʾbum bźugs so.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-grags-pa,Gñug-la Paṇ-chen,1458-1515.

title: The autobiography of Tshul-khrims-rin-chen of Sde-dge and other of his selected writings.
author: Tshul-khrims-rin-chen,Źu-chen,1697-1774.

title: Rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal gsaṅ ba ʾdus paʾi man ṅag rim pa lṅa rab tu gsal baʾi sgron me źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: Tsoṅ-kha-pa Blo-bzaṅ-grags-pa,1357-1419.

title: Tshogs mchod byin rlabs char ʾbebs bźugs so /[Karma-pa Bcu-bźi-pas sbyar]
author: Theg-mchog-rdo-rje,Karma-pa XIV,1797-1867.

title: Dbu ma rgyan gyi źin bris rje raṅ gis gnaṅ ba bźugs so.
author: Tsoṅ-kha-pa Blo-bzaṅ-grags-pa,1357-1419.

title: Rje Grub-thob-chen-pos Lha-ldan Jo-bo Rin-po-cheʼi druṅ du gsol ʼdebs gnaṅ baʼi rdo rjeʼi gsuṅ byin rlabs bdud rtsiʼi sprin phuṅ ʼphro ba bźugs so.
author: Thaṅ-stoṅ-rgyal-po,active 15th century.

title: ʾByuṅ rtsis man ṅag Zla baʾi sñiṅ po źes bya ba bźugs so :ʾbyuṅ dbye nag bsal rtsis graṅs khams bstun man ṅag phyogs bsdus Zla baʾi sñiṅ po tshig don rab gsal dgeʾo /[Tshe-dbaṅ-rnam-rgyal]
author: Tshe-dbaṅ-rnam-rgyal,Khu-nu Bla-ma,1896-1973.

title: Srin bu źes pa ʾbyuṅ ba gsum ldan śiṅ mo yos loʾi zla tho byed grub zuṅ ʾbrel ṅo mtshar ʾbum ldan bźugs so.
author: Tshe-riṅ-rdo-rje,Rtsis-slob.

title: Sa bdag bśags ʾbum bźugs so.
author: Tshe-dbaṅ-rgyal-po,Koṅ.

title: Sa bdag bśags ʾbum bźugs.
author: Tshe-dbaṅ-rgyal-po,Koṅ.

title: Rig-ʾdzin Grub-paʾi-dbaṅ-poʾi rnam thar gyi tshul la gsol ba ʾdebs pa Byin rlabs ñin byed ʾdren paʾi śiṅ rta /[A-yindra-bha-ya-badzras gsol ba btab pa]
author: Tshe-dbaṅ-ʾjigs-med-rdo-rje.

title: Rje-btsun-ma Yid-bźin-ʾkhor-loʾi sgo nas ʾchi blu daṅ ʾbrel ba i brtan bźugs ʾbul tshul ʾChi med grub paʾi dgaʾ ston źes bya ba bźugs so /[Zoṅ Sprul-pas smras paʾo]
author: Zoṅ Blo-bzaṅ-brtson-ʾgrus.

title: Dpal-ldan Bla-ma-dam-pa Ṅag-dbaṅ-bzaṅ-poʾi rnam thar gyi cha śas brjod pa Zla tshes bdud rtsiʾi ʾdzub rlabs źes bya ba :ʾBrug Bde-chos Yoṅs-ʾdzin Daṅ-po Ṅag-dbaṅ-bzaṅ-poʾi rnam thar /Rje-yi-źal-slob Dgyer-gyi-btsun-pa Zla-ba-grags-pa-bzaṅ-pos mdzad pa.
author: Zla-ba-grags-pa-bzaṅ-po,Dgyer-btsun.

title: Lcags phag loʾi lo tho phyogs bsdus :Bod rgyal lo 2098, phyi lo 1971.
Grub chen Dril-bu lugs kyi ʾKhor-lo-sdom-paʾi lus dkyil kyi dmar khrid źal śes bde chen gsal baʾi sgron me źes bya ba bźugs so /[Lcan-skya Rol-paʾi-rdo-rje (dge sloṅ ye śes bstan baʾi mes) sbyar].
author: Rol-paʾi-rdo-rje,Lcaṅ-skya II,1717-1786.

title: Rdor sems thugs kyi me loṅ gi sṅon ʾgro.
author: Rgod-kyi-ldem-ʾphru-can,Gter-ston,1337-1408.

title: Phyi sgrub ʼGro ba kun sgrol las tshe ʼdas rjes ʼdzin dbaṅ chog bźugs so.
author: Mṅaʼ-ris Paṇ-chen Padma-dbaṅ-rgyal,1487 or 1488-1542 or 1543.

title: ʾPhags pa bzaṅ po spyod paʾi smon lam gyi rgyal po daṅ ʾPhags pa byams paʾi smon lam gyi rgyal po bźugs so.
Dam tshig thams cad kyi ñams chag bskoṅ baʾi Dri med bśags rgyud bźugs so.
Tshe dkar sgrub skor.
author: Mchog-gyur-gliṅ-pa,Gter-ston,1829-1870.

title: Źi khro sgrub skor glegs bam gyi dbuʾi rdul len thar lam ʾdren byed.
Zab lam bla ma sgrub ciṅ mchod paʾi cho ga bde chen mkhaʾ spyod ʾjug paʾi sgo źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: ʾJam-dbyaṅs-mkhyen-brtseʾi-ʾod-zer,Kar-sras Koṅ-sprul,1904-1953.

title: Theg rim rtsa ʾgrel che lag bcas.
ʾDul baʾi dkaʾ gnas rnam par dpyad pa ʾkhrul spoṅ blo gsal mgul rgyan tsinta ma ṇiʾi phreṅ mdzes skal bzaṅ re ba kun skon.
author: ʾJam-dbyaṅs-bźad-pa Ṅag-dbaṅ-brtson-ʾgrus,1648-1721.

title: Ma-gcig Gñan-gyi Lha-moʾi gsaṅ baʾi phrin bcol rdo rjeʾi rig ʾdzin gduṅ baʾi smre sṅags gu hya rgya.
author: ʾJam-dbyaṅs-chos-kyi-blo-gros,Mkhyen-brtse,1896-1959.

title: Rare texts of the Bla-braṅ Bkra-śis-ʾkhyil tradition.
Dpal rdo rje Nag-po-chen-poʼi bstod pa brgyad pa źes bya ba /Slob-dpon Klu-sgrub źabs kyis mdzad pa.
pub: He-mi :[Rgod tshaṅ sgrub sdeʼi tshogs pa,1969]
author: Nāgārjuna,active 8th century.

title: Thub chog byin rlabs gter mdzod bźugs so.
author: Mi-pham-rgya-mtsho,ʾJam-mgon ʾJu,1846-1912.

title: Rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dpal gsaṅ ba ʼdus paʼi rtsa baʼi rgyud kyi sgron ma rab tu gsal bar byed paʼi rgya cher bśad paʼi ʼchad pa /Rje btsun Śes-rab-Seṅgeʼi gsuṅ leʼu daṅ po nas bcu bdun bar bźudo.
author: Śes-rab-seṅge,Rgyud-chen,-1445.

title: He ru kaʾi źiṅ du ʾdren paʾi smon lam yid kyi śiṅ rta źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-rnam-rgyal,Źabs-druṅ I,1594-1651.

title: Sgrol ma, Gdugs dkar, Tshe gzuṅs, Śer sñin, Bzaṅ spyod, Ltuṅ bśags, Bde smon bcas bźugs so.
Dpal Kye rdo rje źes bya baʾi rgyud kyi rgyal po bźugs so.
Ka bśad tshigs bcad bcas.
author: Saṅs-rgyas-bstan-ʾdzin,Gser Dgon,1924-

title: Bstan bsruṅs Bkra-śis-tshe-riṅ-maʾi cho ga yid bźin ʾdod ʾjo źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-bstan-ʾdzin-nor-bu,Rdza Roṅ-phu Bla-ma,1867-1940.

title: Tshe dpag med źi ba lha maṅ gi cho ga ʾchi med ʾdod paʾi re skoṅ nag ʾgros su bkod pa bźugs so.
author: Padma-dkar-po,ʾBrug-chen IV,1527-1592.

title: Smon lam khyad par can gyi skor.
ʾPhags pa Śes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa Rdo rje gcod pa źes bya ba theg pa chen poʾi mdo bźugs so.
Mnaʾ bśags rin chen phreṅ ba źes bya ba bźugs so.
Bal-yul Mchod-rten ʾPhags-pa Śiṅ-kun daṅ deʾi gnas gźan rnams kyis dkar chag mdor bsdus bźugs so.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-rdo-rje,Nas-luṅ-pa.

title: Chab gtor ʾJam dpal maʾi cho ga mdor bsdus sñiṅ por dril ba rnam bśad zin bris sbraṅ rtsaʾi zil mṅar źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-bstan-ʾdzin-nor-bu,Rdza Roṅ-phu Bla-ma,1867-1940.

title: Bdud kyi gýul las rab tu rgyal bar byed paʾi dam can rgya mtshoʾi mchod sprin bźugs so.
author: Padma-dkar-po,ʾBrug-chen IV,1527-1592.

title: Phan pa daṅ bde baʾi dpal kun ster bar byed paʾi Ka dpe dpag bsam dbaṅ po źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-yon-tan,1922-

title: Rgyal sras lag len so bdun maʾi ʾgrel pa gźuṅ daṅ gdam[s] ṅag zuṅ ʾjug bdud rtsiʾi bum bzaṅ źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-bstan-ʾdzin-nor-bu,Rdza Roṅ-phu Bla-ma,1867-1940.

title: Tshes bcuʾi phan yon dgos ʾdod kun ʾbyuṅ bźugs so.
Byaṅ-gter Thugs-rje-chen-po ʾGro-ba-kun-sgrol gyi gnas luṅ cho ga bla maʾi źal luṅ ltar zin bris su byas pa gsal byed ñi ma źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: Rgod-kyi-ldem-ʾphru-can,Gter-ston,1337-1408.

title: Kho-bo Bya-btaṅ Chos-dar ram Ṅag-dbaṅ-nor-bu-bzaṅ-por ʾbod pas raṅ snaṅ ʾkhrul pa tshul bźin brjod pa mukti kaʾi phreṅ ba bźugs so.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-nor-bu-bzaṅ-po,1850-1934.

title: Rje btsun Nā ro mkhaʾ spyod maʾi ʾpho baʾi gdams pa gsal baʾi sgron me źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-sbyin-pa-tshul-khrims.

title: Nā-ro Chos drug gi brgyud ʾdebs gsaṅ chen rol moʾi sgra dbyaṅs źes bya ba bźugs so.
Thugs rje chen po Sroṅ-btsan-sgam-poʾi gsuṅs ʾPhags paʾi gsol ʾdebs mdzod gcig ma bźugs so.
Śes rab kyi bla ma med par phyin pa mṅon par rtogs pa lam gyi rim paʾi rgyan ces bya ba bźugs so.
author: Tshul-khrims-dpal-chen.

title: Ro sñoms phyag rgya chen por sgaṅ dril ba /Rgyal ba Rgod-tshaṅ-paʾi gsuṅ bźugs so.
author: Rgod-tshaṅ-pa Mgon-po-rdo-rje,1189-1258.

title: Mñam med Lha-rtse-pa chen poʼi rnam par thar pa rab bsṅags sñan paʼi sgra dbyaṅs brgya pa źes bya ba /Nag-dbaṅ-saṅs-rgyas-rdo-rjes mdzad pa.
author: Saṅs-rgyas-rdo-rje,Mkhas-dbaṅ,active 17th century.

title: Yaṅ ti bla ma sku gsuṅ thugs kyi thig leʼi rgyun gyi las byaṅ sñiṅ poʼi yaṅ bcud bźugs so.
author: Mdo-sṅags-bstan-ʼdzin-nor-bu,ʼKhrul-źig,1923 or 1924-

title: Bsam gzugs kyi sñoms ʾjug rnams kyi rnam par bźag paʾi bstan bcos thub bstan mdzes rgyan luṅ daṅ rigs paʾi rgya mtsho skal bzaṅ dgaʾ byed ces bya ba bźugs so.
author: ʾJam-dbyaṅs-bźad-pa Ṅag-dbaṅ-brtson-ʾgrus,1648-1721.

title: Tshe sgrub lcags sdoṅ maʾi cho ga gźuṅ bźugs so.
author: Theg-mchog-bstan-paʾi-rgyal-mtshan.

title: Rje-btsun Chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan dpal bzaṅ poʾi gsuṅ zin bris su bkod pa las Bsam gzugs kyi mthaʾ gcod bźugs so.
author: Se-ra Rje-btsun Chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan,1469-1546.

title: Sde-dge ʾJam-dbyaṅs Mkhyen-brtseʾi-ʾodzer la dwaṅs gsal me loṅ Gu-ru Bde-ba-chen-pos gsuṅs paʾi Luṅ bstan dus gsum gsal ston źes bya ba bźugs so.
ʾBri-guṅ-paʾi chos spyod.
Slob-dpon Klu-sgrub kyi Bśes pa'i spriṅs yig /[edited by A. Sonam.
author: Nāgārjuna,active 2nd century.

title: ʾPhags paʾi gsol ʾdebs bar chad kun sel ma bźugs so.
author: Śes-rab-rdo-rje.

title: Bde-mchog lhan-skyes kyi dkyil chog bdud rtsiʾi gter bum daṅ ʾbrel baʾi rab gnas mdor bsdus bźugso.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan,Sdiṅs-po-che Cog-gra Sprul-sku VI.

title: Padma-badzra gyi dkyil ʼkhor Grub chen brgyad cuʼi sgrub thabs las byaṅ las rim brgya rtsa ba :Rig-ʼdzin Mi-ʼgyur-rdo-rje drag po nus ldan rtsal gyis gru guʼi lha brag nas gter nas bton pa bźugs so.
author: Mi-ʼgyur-rdo-rje,Yoṅs-dge Gter-ston,1628-

title: Sman blaʾi mdo chog gi sñin poʾi chog sgrigs rin po cheʾi them skas źes bya ba bźugs.
author: Tshe-mchog-gliṅ Ye-śes-rgyal-mtshan,1713-1793.

title: Dpal ldan Stod-rgyud Grwa-tshaṅ gi phyag bźes ltar Gsaṅ-ʼdus daṅ Bde-mchog daṅ ʼbrel bar rab gnas dge legs char ʼbebs bya tshul bźugs so.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-tshul-khrims,Śar-chen.

title: Mgon po phyag bźi paʾi bskaṅ bśags.
Ma rgyud dbaṅ bźi skor.
Thugs-rje-chen-po ʾGro-bo-kun-sgrol kyi bla maʾi rnal ʾbyor, brgyud ʾdebs, byin rlabs myur ʾjug, daṅ phrin las chog khrigs su bsgrigs pa bźugs so.
author: Rgod-kyi-ldem-ʾphru-can,Gter-ston,1337-1408.

title: Bdud kyi gʹyul las rab tu rgyal bar byed paʾi bsñen paʾi man ṅag bźugs so.
author: Padma-dkar-po,ʾBrug-chen IV,1527-1592.

title: ʾPhags pa śes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa Rdo rje gcod pa źes bya ba bźugs so.
Khro bo rgyud drug Spa-gro ma.
Rje btsun Dpal ldan Nag-po-chen-poʾi mṅon rtogs don kun sgrub byed log ʾdren tshar gcod sdaṅ ba rnam bsreg gi phrin las gsal bar byas pa mi nub bstan paʾi rgyal mtshan źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: Mkhaʾ-khyab-rdo-rje,Karma-pa XV,1871-1922.

title: Zam lam Nā-roʾi chos drug gi sgo nas ʾkhrid paʾi rim pa yid ches gsum ldan źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: Tsoṅ-kha-pa Blo-bzaṅ-grags-pa,1357-1419.

title: Rje btsun Sa-skya-paʾi thub bstan lha chen gyi chos spyod rab gsal byin rlabs myur ʾjug ces bya ba bźugs so.
pub: [Saharanpur :Rtse-gdoṅ Grwa-don yod kyis par bskrun źus pa,1971]

title: ʾPhags pa śes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa Rdo rje gcod pa źes bya ba bźugs so.

Phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba chen po ʾJam-mgon Sa-skya Paṇḍi-ta Kun-dgaʾ-rgyal-mtshan-dpal-bzaṅ-poʾi źabs kyi gsuṅ rab glegs bam daṅ po las Thub paʾi dgoṅs pa rab tu gsal ba źes bya baʾi bstan bcos bźugs so.
author: Sa-skya Paṇḍi-ta Kun-dgaʾ-rgyal-mtshan,1182-1251.

title: Gsaṅ don rnam ʾbyed ʾphrul gyi lde mig ces bya ba bźugs pa legs so.
author: Śes-rab-rgyal-mtshan,Mñam-med,1356-1415.

title: Smon lam stobs po che bźugs so.
Smon lam stobs po che bźugs so.
Smon lam khyad par can gyi skor rin po cheʼi phreṅ ba bźugs so
He ru kaʾi źiṅ du ʾdren paʾi smon lam yid kyi śiṅ rta źes bya ba bźugs so.

Bde bśegs kun ʼdus sku gsum bla maʼi bsñen sgrub kyi yig chuṅ man ṅag gsal baʼi sgron me źes bya ba bźugso.

title: Bod kyi brdaʾ dag sa mthaʾi rnam dbye Rab gsal sgron me źes bya ba bźugs so /[Śes-rab-ʾod-zer gyi(s) sbyar]
author: ʾPhreṅ-po Gter-ston Śes-rab-ʾod-zer,1518-1584.

title: Sumbha Mkhan-po Ye-śes-dpal-ʾbyor gyi gsuṅ, Rgya-gar ʾPhags yul, Rgya-nag chen-po, Gaṅs-can Bod yul, Sog yul rnams su dam chos rin chen byuṅ tshul Dpag bsam ljon bzaṅ las :Gaṅs-can Bod kyi yul du dam chos dar tshul gyi dpe deb bźugs so.
author: Sum-pa Mkhan-po Ye-śes-dpal-ʾbyor,1704-1788.

title: Byaṅ chub sems kyi bstod pa rin chen sgron ma źes bya ba bźugs so :the precious lamp of compliment of boudhi-citta /by Negi Lama (Shasan-dhar-dwaj).
author: Bstan-ʾdzin-rgyal-mtshan,Khu-nu.

title: Sman gźuṅ zur bkol daṅ Sman-rtsis khaṅ gi ʾdon chog bcas phyogs bsdus so.
author: Mkhyen-rab-nor-bu,1883?-1963?

title: Bla ma mchod paʾi khrid yig gsaṅ baʾi gnad rnam par phye ba sñan rgyud man ṅag gi gter mdzod ces bya ba bźugs so /[Dge-sloṅ-ye-śes-rgyal-mtshan gyis sbyar ba].
author: Tshe-mchog-gliṅ Ye-śes-rgyal-mtshan,1713-1793.

title: Draṅ ṅes rnam ʾbyed kyi dkaʾ ʾgrel rtsom ʾphro legs bśad sñiṅ poʾi yaṅ sñiṅ źes bya ba bźugs so :the explanation of general and real signification of the doctrine /by Guṅ-thaṅ-bstan-paʾi-sgron-me.
author: Guṅ-thaṅ Dkon-mchog-bstan-paʼi-sgron-me,1762-1823.

title: Sgra yi don sdeb snaṅ gsal sgron me bźugs so =Tibetan Źang źung dictionary /[Źu-yi-rnal-ʾbyor Ñi-ma-grags-pas bkod paʾo.
author: Ñi-ma-grags-pa,Źu-ston,1616-1670.

title: Dbu ma rgyan gyi tshig leʾur byas pa bźugs so /[Slob-dpon Źi-ba-ʾtsho ... mdzad]
author: Śāntarakṣita,705-762.

title: Thos bsam sgom gsum gyi rnam bźag mthaʾ dpyod kyi sgo nas gtan la ʾbebs pa lta ṅan mun sel źes bya ba bźugs so :the system of listening, thinking, and meditating for destroying false perception and ignorance, arrived at by argument.
author: ʾJam-dbyaṅs-bźad-pa Ṅag-dbaṅ-brtson-ʾgrus,1648-1721.

title: Dam paʼi chos rin po che ʼPhags-paʼi yul du ji ltar dar baʼi tshul gsal bar ston pa Dgos ʼdod kun ʼbyuṅ źes bya ba bźugs so /[Tā-ra-nā-thas sbyar]
author: Tāranātha,Jo-naṅ-pa,1575-

title: Grub mthaʾ thams cad kyi khuṅs daṅ ʾdod tshul ston pa Legs bśad śel gyi me loṅ źes bya ba bźugs so /[Blo-bzaṅ-chos-kyi-ñi-ma źes bgyi bas .. sbyar]
author: Blo-bzaṅ-chos-kyi-ñi-ma,Thuʾu-bkwan III,1737-1802.

title: Mkhas ʾjug gi sa bcad mdor bsdus pad dkar phreṅ ba bźugs so /[Mi-pham-ʾjam-dpal-dbyaṅs kyi gsuṅ].
author: Mi-pham-rgya-mtsho,ʾJam-mgon ʾJu,1846-1912.

title: Gsaṅ sṅags ma rgyud sgrub skor.
Grub mthaʾi rnam bśad raṅ gźan grub mthaʾ kun daṅ zab don mchog tu gsal ba kun bzaṅ źiṅ gi ñi ma luṅ rigs rgya mtsho skye dguʾi re ba kun skoṅs.
author: ʾJam-dbyaṅs-bźad-pa Ṅag-dbaṅ-brtson-ʾgrus,1648-1721.

title: Dpon gsas dran pa nam mkhaʾi bla maʾi byin rlabs dbaṅ gi sgrub pa bźugs so.
author: Blo-ldan-sñiṅ-po,1360-1385?

title: So sor thar paʾi mdo yi mchan ʾgrel bźugs so.
author: Gźan-phan-chos-kyi-snaṅ-ba,Gźan-dgaʾ,1871-1927.

title: Padma badzra gyi dkyil ʼkhor Grub chen brgyad cuʼi sgrub thabs las byaṅ las rim brgya rtsa ba.
author: Mi-ʼgyur-rdo-rje,Yoṅs-dge Gter-ston,1628-

title: Mkhas paʾi tshul la ʾjug paʾi sgo źes bya baʾi bstan bcos bźugs so.
pub: [Ka-sbug :Gsuṅ rab ñams gso rgyun spel par khaṅ,1963.
author: Mi-pham-rgya-mtsho,ʾJam-mgon ʾJu,1846-1912.

title: Theg pa chen poʾi lam gyi rim paʾi gźuṅ Byaṅ chub lam gyi sgron ma źes bya ba bźugs so, bkaʾ gdams gźur gdams man ṅag gi rtsa ba.
pub: [Ka-sbug :Phun-gliṅ gsuṅ rabs ñams gso rgyun spel las byed,1965?]
author: Atīśa,982-1054.

title: Dbal-mo las kyi thig le las Gñaʾ-non-dbal-gsas rṅam paʾi gcig bsgrub bźugs so.
author: Bsod-nams-blo-gros,Bru-btsun.

title: Mkhaʾ ʾgro gsaṅ gcod sgrub skor gyi dbuʾi rdul len thar lam bde ʾdren bźugs.
Gliṅ rje mi yi ñi ma Ge-sar nor bu dgra ʾdul gyi rnam thar las sdag gzigs nor rdzoṅ pab leʾu dpaʾ poʾi sñiṅ gi dgaʾ sdon źes bya ba bźugs so.
Grub mthaʼ chen moʼi mchan ʼgrel dkaʼ gnad mdud grol blo gsal gces nor źes bya ba /Ṅag-dbaṅ-dpal-ldan gyis sbyar ba.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-dpal-ldan,Chos-rje,1797-

title: Bstan bcos mṅon par rtogs paʾi rgyan ʾgrel pa daṅ bcas paʾi rnam bśad rnam pa gñis kyi dkaʾ baʾi gnad gsal bar byed pa legs bśad Skal bzaṅ klu dbaṅ gi rol mtsho źes bya ba /[Rje-btsun Chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan gyis mdzad pa]
author: Se-ra Rje-btsun Chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan,1469-1546.

title: Legs par bśad pa rin po cheʾi gter źes bya baʾi bstan bcos bźugs so /[Sa-skya Paṇḍi-ta Kun-dgaʾ-rgyal-mtshan gyis mdzad pa].
author: Sa-skya Paṇḍi-ta Kun-dgaʾ-rgyal-mtshan,1182-1251.

title: Brgya bźiʹi cho ga mdo sṅags zuṅ ʹjug sgrigs chog tu bkod pa bźugs so /[Rā-ga-asye mchog ñid kyis mdzad pa].
author: Karma-chags-med,Gnas-mdo,1610-1678.

title: O-rgyan chen poʼi ma ʼoṅs luṅ bstan /Gar-dbaṅ-rdo-rje daṅ Bya-btaṅ Gro-lod gñis kyi gter nas spyan draṅs pa bźugs so.
author: Gar-dbaṅ-rdo-rje,Mṅaʼ-ris Gter-ston,1640-1685.

title: ʾJam-mgon Sa-skya paṇḍi-tas mdzad paʾi Mkhas pa ʾjug paʾi sgo źes bya baʾi bstan bcos bźugs so =mKHas Pa ʾJug Paʾi sGo, way of the wise ; guide to propagation, disputation and composition of classics /by Sa sKya Pan Dita, Kun dGaʾ rGyal mTSHAN.
author: Sa-skya Paṇḍi-ta Kun-dgaʾ-rgyal-mtshan,1182-1251.

title: Phur bu źes pa ʾbyuṅ ba gsum ldan sa pho spreʾuʾi leʾu tho byed grub zuṅ ʾbrel lkog gyur gsal ston me loṅ źes bya ba bźugs so /Khu-nu Bla-ma Bsod-nams-ʾbrug-rgyas ṅo mas spel.
author: Bsod-nams-ʾbrug-rgyas,Khu-nu,1882-1971.

title: Kloṅ chen sñiṅ gi thig le las bskyed rim lha khrid ʼog min bgrod paʼi them skas bźugs so /[Raṅ-byuṅ-rdo-rje ʼJigs-med-gliṅ-paʼm, miṅ gźan Kloṅ-chen-nam-mkhaʼi-rnal-ʼbyor-du-grags-paʼi-rdzogs-chen-pas legs par bśad pa rdzogs so]
author: ʼJigs-med-gliṅ-pa Raṅ-byuṅ-rdo-rje,1729 or 1730-1798.

title: Byaṅ chub kyi sems mṅaʼ baʼi bya mgrin sṅon zla baʼi rtogs pa brjod pa ʼkhor ba mthaʼ dag la sñiṅ po med par mthoṅ ba rnams kyi rna rgyan źes bya ba bźugs so /[Gnubs-kyi-rigs-las Bandeʼi-śa-gzugs-ma-tiʼi-miṅ-can-no].
author: Stag-phu Blo-bzaṅ-bstan-paʼi-rgyal-mtshan,approximately 1765-

title: Sṅags kyi spyi don tshaṅs dbyaṅs ʾbrug sgra źes bya ba bźugs so =Sngags kyi spyi don tshangs dbyangs ʾabrug sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs so : of mantra all inclusive the eternal melodious thunder herein is contained by kLong-Chen-Rab-ʾabyam-pa.
author: Kloṅ-chen-pa Dri-med-ʼod-zer,1308-1363.

title: Byaṅ chub lam gyi rim paʾi dmar khrid Thams cad mkhyen par bgrod paʾi bde lam źes bya ba bźugs so /[Blo-bzaṅ-chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan gyis ... btab]
author: Blo-bzaṅ-chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan,Panchen Lama I,1567?-1662.

title: Ma ʾoṅs luṅ bstan gsal byed sgron me źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: ʾJam-dbyaṅs-chos-kyi-blo-gros,Mkhyen-brtse,1896-1959.

title: Theg pa chen poʾi man ṅag gi bstan bcos Yid bźin rin po cheʾimdzod kyi ʾgrel pa Padma dkar po. /[Tshul-khrims-blo-gros kyis ... legs par bkod].
author: Kloṅ-chen-pa Dri-med-ʾod-zer,1308-1363.

title: Tshad ma rigs paʼi gter gyi legs bśad Bzaṅ po gsum ldan ces bya ba bźugs so /[Bha-dra-ma-tis sbyar]
author: Blo-gros-bzaṅ-po,Khri-tshe Mkhan-po,1924-

title: Yi geʼi bśad pa Mkhas paʼi kha rgyan :daṅ Dag yig gces bsdus ʼkhrul spoṅ legs par bśad pa i Skya rens gsar ba źes bya ba bźugs so /[A-lag-śa Ṅag-bdaṅ-bstan-dar gyis bgyis].
author: A-lag-śa Ṅag-dbaṅ-bstan-dar,1759-

title: Naṅ paʾi bstan pa la ʾjug paʾi sgo daṅ po bźugs so /by K. G. Bakula.
author: Bakula, K. G.,1917-

title: Tibetan grammer [sic] book :Bod kyi skad la ñe bar mkho baʼi bstan bcos Sum Rtags gñis kyi rnam bśad phyogs bsdebs Kun phan me loṅ źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: Bar-źi-ba, Phun-tshogs-dbaṅ-rgyal.

title: Bla ma dgoṅs pa ʾdus paʾi skoṅ chog las byaṅ khrigs su bsdebs pa Rig pa ʾdzin paʾi lam bzaṅ źes bya ba bźugs so /[ʾJigs-bral-ye-śes-rdo-rjes sbyar].
author: Bdud-ʾjoms ʾJigs-bral-ye-śes-rdo-rje,1904-1987.

title: ʾBum gyi bsdus don sñiṅ po daṅ bcas pa bźugs so /[Atīśa]
author: Atīśa,982-1054.

title: Zab lam bla ma mchod paʼi cho ga bde sto [sic] dbyer med ma daṅ tshogs mchod bcas bźugs so /[Blo-bzaṅ-chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan gyis sbyar baʼo].
author: Blo-bzaṅ-chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan,Panchen Lama I,1567?-1662.

title: Sman blaʾi mdo chog Yid bźin dbaṅ rgyal źes bya ba bźugs so.
Lha bsaṅ rnam dag chos sku ma bźugs so /[Sprul-sku Rin-po-che Bsod-nams-ye-śes-dbaṅ-pos mdzad pa].
author: Bsod-nams-ye-śes-dbaṅ-po,ʾBras-spuṅs Gzims-khaṅ-goṅ-ma II,1556-1592.

title: Lta baʾi śan ʾbyed Theg mchog gnad kyi zla zer źes bya ba bźugs so /[Bsod-nams-seṅges sbyar]
author: Go-rams-pa Bsod-nams-seṅge,1429-1489.

title: Spyi nor Goṅ-sa Skyabs-mgon-chen-po mchog nas rim stsal Bkaʾ slob khag ʾgaʾ śas phyogs bsdebs źus pa.
author: Bstan-ʾdzin-rgya-mtsho,Dalai Lama XIV,1935-

title: Rje-btsun Chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan-dpal-bzaṅ-poʾi gsuṅ Mkhas paʾi mgul rgyan ces bya ba Sa lam rnam gźag bźugs so.
author: Se-ra Rje-btsun Chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan,1469-1546.

title: Yul gaṅs can paʼi brda yaṅ dag par sbyor baʼi bstan bcos kyi bye brag Sum cu pa daṅ Rtags kyi ʼjug paʼi gźuṅ gi rnam par bśad pa Mkhas paʼi mgul rgyan Mu tig phreṅ mdzes źes bya ba bźugs so /[Gtsug-lag-chos-kyi-snaṅ-ba ... brtsams]
author: Si-tu Paṇ-chen Chos-kyi-ʼbyuṅ-gnas,1699 or 1700-1774.

title: Rdo rje theg paʾi dam tshig gi ñes Ituṅ phyir bcos paʾi cho ga rig ʾdzin dbugs dbyuṅ gi thig le źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: Mchog-gyur-gliṅ-pa,Gter-ston,1829-1870.

title: Goṅ-sa Rgyal-dbaṅ Lṅa-pa-chen-po-mchog gis mdzad paʾi Bod kyi rgyal rabs rdzogs ldan gźon nuʾi dgaʾ ston :Early history of Tibet /by Ṅag dBaṅ Blo bZan rGya mTsho ; edited by Ngawang Gelek Demo.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-blo-bzaṅ-rgya-mtsho,Dalai Lama V,1617-1682.

title: A mirror of the rTag-jug grammar /by Kachen Padma.
author: Padma-mchog-dpal-bzaṅ-po,Dkaʼ-chen.

title: Modern Tibetan grammar /by Kachen-Padma ; edited, L. Jamspal.
author: Padma-mchog-dpal-bzaṅ-po,Dkaʼ-chen.

title: Dpal Kye-rdo-rjeʾi dbaṅ gi chu bo chen mo Mdzes par byed paʾi rgyan źes bya ba bźugs so /[Dkon-mchog-lhun-grub kyis sbyar]
author: Dkon-mchog-lhun-grub,Ṅor-chen,1497-1557.

title: Lam ʾbras bu daṅ bcas paʾi gdams ṅag gi gźun śiṅ rgyas pa gźuṅ ji lta ba bźin bkri baʾi lam gyi sṅon ʾgroʾi khrid yig snaṅ gsum mdzes par byed paʾi rgyan źes bya ba bźugs so /[Dkon-mchog-lhun-grub kyis sbyar ba].
author: Dkon-mchog-lhun-grub,Ṅor-chen,1497-1557.

title: Thig gi lag len du ma gsal bar bśad pa Bzo rig mdzes paʾi kha rgyan źes bźugs so / [Rȯn-tha Blo-bzaṅ-dam-chos-rgya-mtshos mdzad]
author: Roṅ-tha Blo-bzaṅ-dam-chos-rgya-mtsho,1863-1917.

title: A-tri thun-tsham cho-na dan cha-lak che shuk-so.
ʾJam dpal khro chu Dug gdoṅ man ṅag lug[s] kyi sgrub thabs.
author: Jam-dpal-nor-bu,Rdza-stod Mtshan-ñid Sprul-sku IV,1892-

title: ʾJam-dbyaṅs bla maʾi rnal ʾbyor la bsten paʾi tshogs mchod Bsod nams rab rgyas źes bya ba bźugs so /[Dharma-ma-tis glur]
author: ʾJam-dbyaṅs-chos-kyi-blo-gros,Mkhyen-brtse,1896-1959.

title: Rdo-rje-rnam-par-ʾjoms-paʾi sgo nas dkar phyogs rnams la ri khrus kluṅ khrus sal.

Bod kyi brda sprod paʼi bstan bcos Sum cu pa daṅ Rtags kyi ʼjug paʼi rnam bśad Thon-miʼi dgoṅs ʼgrel źes bya ba bźugs so :A Tibetan grammar based on the Sumcupa and rTagskyihjukpa /with a commentary by Dorje Wangchuk Kharto.
author: Kharto, Dorrje Wangchuk.

title: Kloṅ chen sñiṅ tig gi sṅon ʼgroʼi ṅag ʼdon Rnam mkhyen lam bzaṅ gsal byed bcas bźugs so /[Mkhyen-brtseʼi-dbaṅ-pos smras]
author: Mkhyen-brtseʼi-dbaṅ-po,ʼJam-dbyaṅs,1820-1892.

title: Mgron rdzogs bsaṅ mchod bsdus pa ʾdod dguʾi dpal ster ces bya ba bźugs so.
pub: [Dal-hor :Phun-gliṅ gsuṅ rab ñams gso rgyun spel par khaṅ,1967]
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-kun-dgaʾ-bstan-ʾdzin,Khams-sprul III,1680-1728.

title: ʾOd zer ʾphreṅ ba [and] Ye śes snaṅ ba rnam ʾbyed =ʾAod zer phreng ba and Ye shes snang ba rnam ʾbyed : Garland of rays [and] Wisdom, appearance, absolute discrimination thereof /by Mi-Pham-Rinpoche Ajitaguru.
author: Mi-pham-rgya-mtsho,ʾJam-mgon ʾJu,1846-1912.

title: Brgal lan ñin byed snaṅ ba =Brgal lan nyin byed snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so /by Mi-Pham-Rin-poche (Ajitaguru).
author: Mi-pham-rgya-mtsho,ʼJam-mgon ʼJu,1846-1912.

title: Yaṅ zab Dkon mchog spyi ʾdus dyi gnas luṅ chog las kyi sgrib pa Sku gsum myur lam źes bya ba bźugs so /[Mdo-khams-pas brjod]
author: Sgrub-brgyud-ñi-ma,Khams-sprul V,1781-1847.

title: ʾDul ba mdo rtsa baʾi rnam bśad Ñi maʾi ʾod zer legs bśad luṅ gi rgya mtsho źes bya ba bźugs so /[ʾDul-ʾdzin Mtsho-sna-ba Chen-pos mdzod]
author: Rin-chen-bzaṅ-po,Mtsho-sna-ba.

title: Chos skyoṅ spyi yi tshogs ʾkhor gyi yi ge Bdud rtsiʾi sprin phuṅ źes bya ba bźugs so /[Ṅag-dbaṅ-dge-legs pas smras]
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-legs-pa,Sga-ston,1864-1941.

title: Graṅs kyi mṅon brjod kyi rnam bśad :daṅ Brda gsar rñiṅ gi khyad par cuṅ zad bstan pa Gsar buʾi blo gros bskyed byed bcas bźugs so.
author: Dṅul-chu Dharmabhadra,1772-1851.

title: Sñan rgyud Yid bźin nor buʾi bskyed paʾi rim pa rgyas pa ʾDod paʾi re skoṅ źes bya ba bźugs so /[Padma-dkar-pos bkad]
author: Padma-dkar-po,ʾBrug-chen IV,1527-1592.

title: ʾJam-dbyaṅs bla ma mchod paʾi cho ga tshogs gñis char ʾbebs źes bya ba bźugs so /[Mkhyen-brtseʾi-dbaṅ-pos bris pa].
author: Mkhyen-brtseʾi-dbaṅ-po,ʾJam-dbyaṅs,1820-1892.

title: ʾTsho byed gźon nuʾi mgul rgyan /[Khrosprul ʾGyur-med-nag-dban nas phyogs bsgrigs].
author: Khro-dgaʾ ʾGyur-med-ṅag-dbaṅ,1932-

title: Sdig sgrib kun ʾjoms bźugs so.
Śes byaʾi mkhaʾ dbyiṅs daṅ Ka lā pa na bcas bźugs.
Bde gśegs ston pa so lṅa mchod paʹi Mdo chog ʹkhyer bde bdud rtsiʹi sñiṅ po bźugs so /[Stag-sprul Rig-pa-ʹdzin-pa Padma-ba-dzra pas sbyar pa].
author: Stag-phu Padmavajra.

title: Sambha-laʾi smon lam bźugs so /[Pan-chen-thams-cad-mkhyen-pa Blo-bzan-dpal-ldan-ye-śes kyis mdzad paʾo].
author: Dpal-ldan-ye-śes,Panchen Lama III,1738?-1780.

title: Byaṅ-chub-sems-dpaʾ Sems-dpaʾ-chen-po Grags-pa-byaṅ-chub-dpal-bzaṅ-poʾi rtogs pa brjod paʾi sñan dṅags Byin rlabs kyi lhun po źes bya ba /[Tsoṅ-kha-pa Blo-bzaṅ-grags-paʾi-dpal gyis ... sbyar]
author: Tsoṅ-kha-pa Blo-bzaṅ-grags-pa,1357-1419.

title: Bod kyi rgyal rabs daṅ ʾbrel baʾi Goṅ-sa Sku-phreṅ Bcu-gsum-pa-chen-poʾi srid phyogs kyi mdzad pa gtso bor ston pa /[Bkaʾ-blon Thub-bstan-nor-bzaṅ nas gsuṅ]
author: Thub-bstan-nor-bzaṅ,chos-don Braʾ-blon,1904-

title: ʾDzam gliṅ gi bde ba gsar pa /[Mkhan-chuṅ Thub-bstan-bzaṅ-po nas bsam]
author: Thub-bstan-bzaṅ-po,Mkhan-chuṅ.

title: ʼJam mgon chos kyi rgyal po tsoṅ kha pa chen poʼi rnam thar thub bstan mdzes paʼi rgyan gcig ṅo mtshar nor buʼi ʼphreṅ ba źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: Blo-bzaṅ-ʼphrin-las-rnam-rgyal,Rgyal-dbaṅ Chos-rje Dar-han Mkhan-po,active 1840-1860.

title: Joʼi bstod bźugs so.
Sde gsum sñiṅ poʾi don ʾgrel gnas lugs rin po cheʾi mdzod ces bya baʾi ʾgrel pa bźugs.
author: Kloṅ-chen-pa Dri-med-ʾod-zer,1308-1363.

title: Chos mṅon mdzod kyi tshig leʼur byas paʼi ʼgrel pa mṅon paʼi rgyan źes bya ba bźugs so.
author: Mchims Nam-mkhaʼ-grags,-1289 or 1290.

title: Gzuṅs mdoʾi glegs bam dgos ʾdod kun ʾbyuṅ.

title: Bod rgyal khab kyi chab srid daṅ ʾbrel baʾi dmag don lo rgyus /rtsom sgrig pa Rgyal-rtse Rnam-rgyal-dbaṅ-ʾdus.
Padmaʾi gsaṅ thig dgoṅs ʾdus kyi brgyud paʾi phyag len dkrus su bkod pa dṅos grub kun ʾbyun źes bya ba bźugs so.
Rnam dag bde ba can gyi źiṅ sgrub padma drwa baʾi chog sgrig bde chen lam bzaṅ bźugs so.
ʾJam-dbyaṅs-nor-bu rjes ʾbraṅ daṅ bcas paʾi grib ma dgrar laṅ la brtag paʾi tshoms źes bya ba bźugs so /[phyogs bsgrigs byed po, Klu-tshaṅ Blo-bzaṅ-ye-śes ; Sgrol-dkar-skyabs].

Rje bla ma ʾJam-dbyaṅs-kun-dgaʾ-bstan-paʾi-rgyal-mtshan gyi rnam par thar pa byin rlabs rgya mtsho ṅo mtshar gter mdzod ces bya ba bźugs so, 1884-1952 /Mkhan-po Phrin-las-chos-ʾphel gyis mdzad paʾo ; [Gdoṅ-thog Bstan-paʾi-rgyal-mtshan gyis rtsom sgrig bgyis].

Grub mthaʼ bźiʼi lugs kyi kun rdzob daṅ don dam paʼi don ram par bśad paʼi legs bśad dpyid kyi dpal moʼi glu dbyaṅs źes bya ba bźugs so /Khal-kha Ṅag-dbaṅ-dpal-ldan. title: Rgya Bod khrims lugs tshig mdzod /Bod-ljoṅs raṅ skyoṅs ljoṅs mi dmaṅs źib dpyod khaṅ gis brtsams ; rtsom sgrig gtso bo, Tshe-riṅ-don-grub.
Lhan gcig skyes sbyor gyi zab khrid ṅes don rgya mtshoʼi sñiṅ po phrin las ʼod ʼphro bźugs /Karma-pa Dbaṅ-phyug-rdo-rjes brtsams.
pub: [Xinggang, China] :Źan-kaṅ-then-mā Dpe-skrun-khaṅ gis bskrun te bkram,2005.
author: Dbaṅ-phyug-rdo-rje,Karma-pa IX,1556-1603.

title: Byaṅ gter don chaʼi skor stod cha sgrub skor rnam gsum yan lag daṅ bcas pa dṅos grub mchog sbyin zhes bya ba bzhugs so /edited by Nub-ri-ba Chos-kyi-nyi-ma Rin-po-che.
pub: Kathmandu :Khenpo Shedup Tenzin & Lama Thinley Namgyal,2005.

title: Bod kyi gso ba rig paʼi gnaʼ dpe phyogs bsgrigs dpe tshogs /Mtsho-sṅon Źiṅ-chen Bod kyi gso rig źib ʼjug khaṅ, "Bod kyi gso ba rig paʼi gnaʼ dpe phyogs bsgrigs" rtsom sgrig tshogs pa nas bsgrigs.
Dge sloṅ ma Dpal-mo daṅ ʼDas log Gliṅ-sa-chos-skyid gñis kyi rnam thar.

Bod kyi skad yig sbyoṅ rim gsal źin ʼbri klog srol rgyun gyi cha śas rgyal rabs lo rgyus tshig ñuṅ don tshaṅ blo gsal las daṅ po ba rnams la mkho baʼi sna ʼdzoms śes byaʼi baṅ mdzod daṅs śes me loṅ źes bya ba bźugs so /rtsom daṅ phyogs sgrig źu po ni, Gtsaṅ-stod Phu-dmar-bar-ʼtsho Rin-chen-dbaṅ-rgyal lo.
author: Rin-chen-dbaṅ-rgyal,Gtsaṅ-stod Phu-dmar Bar-ʼtsho.

title: Phyi rgyal gyi tshad ma rig paʼi źib ʼjug /Yul-naṅ Ṅag-dbaṅ-bstan-ʼdzin gyis bsgyur.
Gtam dpe /Rin-chen-tshe-riṅ gis ʼtshol sgrig byas.
Sa dpyad phyogs bsgrigs /[Slob-dpon Padma-ʼbyuṅ-gnas sogs kyis mdzad] ; Bsod-nams-dbaṅ-ldan gyis bsrgigs te ʼgrel.
Legs bśad gser gyi phreṅ baʼi khas paʼi bgro gleṅ theṅs gñis pa bskyaṅs skabs kyi rtsom śog phyogs bsdus legs bśad padma dkar poʼi chun po źes bya ba bźugs so.
pub: Mundgod, Dist. North Kanara, Karnataka :ʼBras-spuṅ bkra śis sgo maṅ dpe mdzod,c2005.

title: Draṅ bden źi bde ʼbod paʼi legs skyes /Dhīḥ-tsha Mun-ʼjoms-sgron-mes brtsams.
author: Mun-ʼjoms-sgron-me,Dhīḥ-tsha,1963-

title: Brgal lan ñi ʼod zegs ma la phul baʼi rtsod lan nam mkhaʼi kloṅ chen /ʼBaʼ Don-grub-rgyal gyis brtsams.
author: Don-grub-rgyal,ʼBaʼ.

title: Mdo-smad rtsis don ñuṅ bsdus /Grags-pa-rgya-mtsho daṅ ʼJigs-byed-skyabs kyis rtsom sgrig byas.
pub: Lan-chou :Kan-suʼu mi rigs dpe skrun khaṅ,2005.

title: Gźan phan gzi ʼod ʼphro baʼi źabs rjes /Dhīḥ-tsha Mun-ʼjoms-sgron-mes brtsams.
author: Mun-ʼjoms-sgron-me,Dhīḥ-tsha,1963-

title: ʼPhags pa śes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan rin po che sdud pa daṅ deʼi ʼgrel pa sbas don gsal baʼi sgron me bcas bźugs so /ʼgrel pa mdzad pa po, Bstan-paʼi-sgron-me.
pub: Mundgod, Dist. North Kanara, Karnataka :ʼBras-spuṅ bkra śis sgo maṅ dpe mdzod,2005.
author: Bstan-paʼi-sgron-me,Chos-mdzod.

title: Chos spyod bde chen them skas kyi don bsdus mtsho skyes źal luṅ źes bya ba bźugs so /phyogs sgrig pa, Mṅaʼ-ris-pa Tshe-dbaṅ-rig-ʼdzin.
pub: Kathmandu :Tshe-dbaṅ-byaṅ-chub dgaʼ tshal gliṅ :Nam-khyuṅ tshogs khaṅ bla braṅ [nas ʼgrem spel źus],2005.

title: Bod miʼi tshe srog gleṅ baʼi lhag bsam /Dhīḥ-tsha Mun-ʼjoms-sgron-mes brtsams.
author: Mun-ʼjoms-sgron-me,Dhīḥ-tsha,1963-

title: ʼGrel ba don gsal gyi rnam bśad rtogs dkaʼi snaṅ ba źes bya ba bźugs so /Mkhas-grub Thams-cad-mkhyen-pas mdzad ; ʼGar-rtse Tshul-khrims kyis rtsom sgrig byas.
author: Mkhas-grub Dge-legs-dpal-bzaṅ-po,1385-1438.

title: Bya nag spun gsum /Gcod-pa Don-grub kyis brtsams.
pub: [Xinggang] :Rgya spyi gʼyaṅ dpal rig gnas dpe skrun khaṅ,2005.
author: Don-grub.

title: Mi-bskyod Mkhas-grub-rgya-mtshoʼi gsuṅ rtsom phyogs bsgrigs /Sṅags maṅ źib ʼjug khaṅ gis bsgrigs ; [Hūm̐-chen daṅ Ñi-zlas bsgrigs].
author: Mkhas-grub-rgya-mtsho,Mi-bskyod Sprul-sku,1929-

title: Rje-btsun A-rol rdo rje ʼchaṅ sku phren gsum pa Blo-bzaṅ-luṅ-rtogs-bstan-paʼi-rgyal-mtshan gyi gsuṅ rtsom phyogs bsgrigs /Mtsho-lho-khul Bod kyi skad yig bya baʼi u yon lhan khaṅ gis tshol sdud legs sgrig byas.
pub: Xinghai :Mtsho-sṅon mi rigs dpe skrun khaṅ,2002.
author: Blo-bzaṅ-luṅ-rtogs-bstan-paʼi-rgyal-mtshan,1888-1959.

title: ʼBras-spuṅs dgon du bźugs su gsol baʼi dpe rñiṅ dkar chag /Dpal brtsegs Bod yig dpe rñiṅ źib ʼjug khaṅ nas bsgrigs.
Byaṅ chub sems dpaʼi rtogs pa brjod pa dpag bsam gyi khri śiṅ źes bya ba bźugs so /Rgyal-po Dge-baʼi-dbaṅ-pos mdzad ; Śoṅ-ston Rdo-rjes-rgyal-mtshan sogs kyis bsgyur.
pub: Lha-sa :Bod-ljoṅs mi dmaṅs dpe skrun khaṅ,2004.
author: Kṣemendra,active 11th century.

title: Grub dbaṅ Padma-raṅ-grol gyi gsuṅ rtsom phyogs bsgrigs /Sṅags maṅ źib ʼjug khaṅ gis bsgrigs.
author: Padma-raṅ-grol,Rin-po-che,1786-1838.

title: Chos mṅon paʼi mdzod kyi tshig leʼur byas pa Slob-dpon Śakyaʼi-dge-sloṅ Dbyig-gñen gyis mdzad paʼi rnam bśad Tshig don daṅ ʼbrel baʼi dwogs gcod Chos mṅon dpag bsam ʼdod ʼjo źes bya ba bźugs so /mdzad pa po, Dge-sloṅ Rnam-rgyal-dbaṅ-chen.
author: Namgyal Wangchen.

title: Gliṅ sgruṅ gces btus /gtso sgrig pa, ʼJam-dpal-rgya-mtsho.

ʼBri-guṅ Bka-brgyud kyi phyag bźes mgon po Mi-ʼkhrugs-paʼi dkyil chog cha lag daṅ bcas pa bźugs so =Collection of the bhagavān Akṣobhya maṇḍala ritual with commentary of ʼBri-guṅ Bka-brgyud tradition /by Dkon-mchog-ratna and ʼBri-guṅ Bka-brgyud-pa masters.
author: Dkon-mchog-rin-chen,1590-1654.

title: The works of Ngorchen Kunga Zangpo.
author: Ṅor-chen Kun-dgaʼ-bzaṅ-po,1382-1456.

title: Zab-bu-luṅ gi gnas yig /[rtsom sgrig ʼgan ʼkhur ba, Don-grub-phun-tshogs].
Bya chuʼi ʼgyur khug /Gnam-lha-thar gyis bsgrigs.
ʼBri-guṅ gi gnas spyi daṅ sprel lo ʼpho ba chen moʼi ṅo sprod /ʼBri-guṅ Dkon-mchog-rgya-mtshos brtsams.
author: Dkon-mchog-rgya-mtsho,Ra-se,1968-

title: Gnubs rigs Roṅ-thaʼi rus mdzod ge sar ʼbroṅ gi ru thur /Tshe-riṅ-dpal-ʼbyor daṅ Rdo-rje-rig-ʼdzin gñis kyis brtsams.
author: Tshe-riṅ-dpal-ʼbyor.

title: Dbyin Bod śan sbyar gyi phyi rgyal gyi go bdeʼi dgod gtam gces btus /Bstan-ʼdzin-phun-tshogs kyis bsgrigs ; Bstan-ʼdzin-phun-tshogs daṅ Rgyal-mtshan-stobs-rgyal gyis bsgyur.
A Nyingmapa traveler's companion :a collection of prayers to invoke Guru Rinpoche.
pub: Hawley, MA :Mahasidhha Nyingmapa Center ;Gangtok, Sikkim :Deorali Chorten Gonpa,2005.

title: Ñi śu paʼi rtsa ʼgrel ;daṅ, Tshad ma de kho na ñid bsdus pa las raṅ bźin brtag pa daṅ dbaṅ phyug brtag pa bdag brtag pa bcas kyi ʼdka ʼgrel bźugs so /ñi śu paʼi rtsa ʼgrel, Slob-dpon Dbyig-gñen ; ʼdka ʼgrel Slob-dpon Kamala-śīla.
pub: Sarnatha, Varanasi :Wā-ṇa Bkaʼ-brgyud ñam skyoṅ tshogs pa skabs so gcig pas dpar skrun źus,2004.
author: Vasubandhu.

title: Dpal mtshuṅs med rgyal dbaṅ chos rjes mdzad paʼi bar doʼi gsol dbebs kyi dgoṅs don mdo tsam bkral ba myur lam zab moʼi them skas źes bya ba bźugs so /Deʼu-lhas Kun-dgaʼ-mi-ʼgyur-rdo-rje.
pub: [Darjeeling] :Rdor-gliṅ ʼBrug-sgar dpe mdzod khaṅ nas dpar du bskrun,2006.
author: Kun-dgaʼ-mi-ʼgyur-rdo-rje,Dreʼu-lhas Grub-dbaṅ,1721-1769.

title: Sgra rig paʼi bslab gźi /Mkhaʼ-ʼbum gyis sgrig rtsom byas.
author: Mkhaʼ-ʼbum.

title: Kun mkhyen dbu maʼi mthaʼ dpyod daṅ deʼi sdom tshig gi dogs dpyod stoṅ thun skal bzaṅ mig sman źes bya ba bźugs so /Skal-bzaṅ-chos-sruṅ gis brtsams.
author: Skal-bzaṅ-chos-sruṅ,1908-1995.

title: Nag-chuʼi dmaṅs khrod gstam dpe thor bsdus /Nag-chu sa gnas srid gros lo rgyus rig gnas dpyad gziʼi rgyu cha rtsom sgrig khaṅ nas bsdu sgrig byas ; [bsdu sgrig ʼgan ʼkhur ba, Bsod-nams-rgyal-mtshan].
Rig-ʼdzin-chos-rgyal-gliṅ-paʼi rnam thar bźugs /Tshe-riṅ-dpal-ʼbyor gyis brtsams.
author: Tshe-riṅ-dpal-ʼbyor.

title: ʼDul ba me tog phreṅ rgyud ;Kā ri kā sum brgya pa ; Kā ri kā lṅa brgya pa bcas so /ʼPhags-pa-sa-gaʼi-lha sogs
author: Viśakhadeva.

title: Byaṅ gter ʼdon chaʼi skor smad cha bkaʼ dgoṅs phur gsum yan lag daṅ bcas pa phrin las kun ʼgrub ces bya ba bzhugs so /edited by Nub-ri-ba Chos-kyi-nyi-ma Rin-po-che.
pub: Kathmandu :Khenpo Shedup Tenzin & Lama Thinley Namgyal,2005.

title: Spyod ʼjug śer ʼgrel śer phyin dkaʼ gnad bźugs /[Dge-bsñen Theg-mchog].
author: Theg-mchog,Dge-bsñen.

title: Ri chos rten gsum ʼchi phoʼi gdams pa bźugs.
ʼPhags pa thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa ʼgyod tshaṅs kyi sdig sbyaṅs te saṅs rgyas su grub par rnam par bkod pa źes bya ba theg pa chen poʼi mdo bźugs so.
pub: [Kathmandu :Śrī Gau-tam Buddha Wi-har gyi Gsuṅ rab rgyun spel khaṅ,2005]

title: Nes don gyi ñams len la mkho baʼi zí byed gcod kyi gdams pa sogs sna ʼgaʼ bzúgs so.
Sngags ʼchang rin chen phreng ba, or, ʼDod ʼjoʼi bum bzang rin chen kun gyi gter mdzod /[compiled by Dpal-ʼbyor-rgya-mtsho].
pub: West Point Darjeeling, W.B. :Drukar Library, T.S.C. Monastery,2005.

title: Bcom ldan ʼdas dpal dgyes pa rdo rjeʼi sgrub thabs, dkyil chog, sbyin sreg, tshogs mchod, dud sol maʼi gtor chog, rgyun khyer bcas nag po ʼgro śes su bkod pa bźugs so /[nag ʼgros pa, Mkhan-po Śes-rab-phun-tshogs ; dpe sgrig pa, Blo-gros-rab-rgyas].
pub: Sarnath, Varanasi :Wā-ṇa Badzra Bi-dhyāʼi dpe mdzod khaṅ nas par skrun źus,2005.

title: Dpal ʼBri-guṅ Bkaʼ-brgyud kyi dbyaṅs yig phyogs bsgrigs sñan paʼi dbyar rṅa źes bya ba bźugs so.

Kun mkhyen chen po rje btsun Blo-bzaṅ ʼJam-dbyaṅs-ye-śes Bstan-paʼi-rgyal-mtshan dpal bzaṅ poʼi rnam par thar ba dpag bsam ljon pa źes bya ba bźugs so /Rgya-źabs-druṅ Skal-bzaṅ-dkon-mchog-rgya-mtshos brtsams.
author: Dkon-mchog-rgya-mtsho,Rgya-źabs-druṅ,1896-1960.

title: Ṅag sgron =Vāk pradīpa : Bhoṭī-Hindī śabakośa /rtsa ba, Dpal-khaṅ Lo-tsa-ba ; tshig gsal, Khu-nu Bla-ma Bstan-ʼdzin-rgyal-mtshan ; anuvādaka, Rośana Lāla Negī Bishṭa.
pub: Sarnath, Varanasi :Kargyud Relief and Protection Committee, Central Institute of Higher Tibetan Studies,2004.
author: Dpal-khaṅ Ṅag-dbaṅ-chos-kyi-rgya-mtsho,active 16th century.

pub: [Dharamsala] :Dpal-spuṅs gsuṅ rab ñams gso khaṅ nas spar bskrun grems spel źus paʼo,2003.

author: Tshogs-gñis-rab-rgyas.

pub: Bylakuppe, Distt. Mysore ;Paṇ-chen Aer-te-ni źabs źu las don lte gnas [khaṅ],2005-

pub: Ldi-li :Bod kyi gtsug lag źib dpyod khaṅ nas dpar skrun źus,c2005.

Ś̀am-bha-laʼi coṅ sgra /Byams-pa-dge-legs kyis brtsams.
author: Gcan-raṅ-sad,1972-

author: Tsoṅ-kha-pa Blo-bzaṅ-grags-pa,1357-1419.

title: Lha-sde-tsho-baʼi khyim rgyud mu ʼbrel ba soʼi do śal /Lha-sde khyim rgyud ʼtshol sdud tshogs pa nas.
ʼPhyoṅs rgyas Zla-ba-sgrol-ma /Mkhas-grub kyis brtsams.
author: Mkhas-grub,1957-

title: Bod-ljoṅs mdzaʼ gźas /Bde-chen-sgrol-dkar gyis legs sgrig byas.
Grub chen brgyad cuʼi rnam thar daṅ źal thaṅ /Tshe-dbaṅ-rin-chen gyis bsgrigs.
pub: Lha-sa :Bod-ljoṅ mi dmaṅs dpe skrun khaṅ,27 cm.

title: So lha daṅ gzab ñan :Bod kyi sñan ṅag gsar ba bdams dpyad /Tshe-grub kyis brtsams.
pub: Qinghai :Mtsho-sṅon mi rigs dpe skrun khaṅ,2005.
author: Tshe-riṅ-don-grub,1968-

title: Bod kyi rtsom rig gsar paʼi brtsams chos bdams bkod daṅ de dag gi bśad pa /Bdud-lha-rgyal gyis sgrig rtsom byas.
Naṅ chos daṅ tshan rig las brtsams paʼi ched rtsom gces btus zla gsar /rtsom sgrig pa, Na-ga Saṅs-rgyas-bstan-dar.
Bod kyi brda sprod nag ṭikaḥ /Na-ga Saṅs-rgyas-bstan-dar.
author: Saṅs-rgyas-bstan-dar,Na-ga.

title: Bod kyi yi geʼi rnam bśad Seṅ geʼi ṅa ro/Dpal-bsdus kyis brtsams.

author: Dpal-bsdus,1966-

title: Chos tshig bod dbyin śan sbyar =Tibetan English religious word dictionary /bsgyur sgrig pa, Tshe-riṅ-don-grub.

pub: Sāranātha, Vārāṇasī. :Kendrīya Ucca Tibbatī Śikshā Samsthāna,2006.

Bod kyi Dgu-bcu-gsum las ʼgul tshogs paʼi lo gsum gyi las bsdoms ʼgod ʼbul źus pa :2001 spyi zla 10 tshes 1 nas 2004 spyi zla 9 tshes 20 bar.

author: Dkon-mchog-bstan-ʼdzin,Mkhan-sprul,1963-

author: ʼGos Lo-tsā-ba Gźon-nu-dpal,1392-1481.

pub: West Point Darjeeling, W. B. :ʼBrug Sgar Dpe-mdzod-khaṅ nas dpar du bskrun,2004.

title: Chab-mdoʼi yig tshaṅ phyogs sgrig /[rtsom pa po, Rgyar-sprul Blo-bzaṅ-bstan-ʼdzin-chos-kyi-dbaṅ-phyug ... (et al.)].
La-dwags pho ña.

title: Bod kyi sgog pa /ʼJigs-med kyis rtsom sgrig byas ; Tshe-nor daṅ Dpal-ʼdzoms kyis bsgyur.

Sbas-yul ʼBras-mo-ljoṅs su deṅ rabs Bod kyi bla ma skyes chen dam pa rnams kyis mdzad pa phyag ris ji bskyaṅs kyi rnam thar śin tu bsdus pa bźugs so /Ātsārya Tshul-khrims-rgya-mtshos phyogs sgrig źus.
ʼBras-ljoṅs dgon sdeʼi lo rgyus gsar bźad chu skyes buṅ baʼi rol mtsho źes bya ba bźugs so /Atsarya Bsam-gtan-rgya-mtsho Leb-ca.

title: Rgyal dbaṅ ʼBrug-pa Dkar-brgyud ʼPhrin-las Śiṅ-rtaʼi-sde mchog gi rnam thar dad pa rgya mtshoʼi gru rdziṅs daṅ dad paʼi rgya mtsho ʼphyur byed ces bya ba bźugs so /mdzad pa po Ratna-sa-mu-dra daṅ ʼDzi-sgar Rdo-rje-drag-po ; [źu sgrig pa Mkhan-po Bśad-sgrub-bstan-ʼdzin].
pub: Plouray, France :Pha-ran-si Dpal ʼBrug-paʼi Chos-tshogs nas chos sbyin du spel,2010.
author: Samudra, Ratna.

title: Rdzogs pa chen poʼi źaṅ źuṅ sñan rgyud bkaʼ rgyud skor bźi.

Naṅ-chen skyabs mgon ma hā Paṇḍi-ta grub rigs khyu mchog A-ldeʼu Rin-po-cheʼi gsuṅ rtsom daṅ rjes dran dad gduṅ mtsho chen bskyod paʼi rlab ʼphreṅ źes bya ba bźugs so /źu sgrig pa, Naṅ-chen Tshul-khrims-rnam-rgyal.
Phyag chen sṅon ʼgro thun moṅ gi khrid yig gser gyi thigs pa źes bya ba bźugs so /mdzad pa po ṡrī Seṅ-brag Sprul-sku Ṅag-dbaṅ-ʼgyur-med-chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan ; [edited by Khenpo Shedup Tenzin].
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-ʼgyur-med-chos-kyi-rgyal-mtshan,Seṅ-brag Rin-po-che V,1947-2005.

title: Bod kyi rtsom rig lo rgyus /rtsom sgrig pa, Chab-ʼgag Rdo-rje-tshe-riṅ ... [et al.] ; rtsom sgrig ʼgan ʼkhur ba, Bstan-rgyas, Lhag-sgron.
pub: Lha-sa :Bod-ljoṅs mi dmaṅs dpe skrun khaṅ,2009.

title: Khams brgyad gtan la phab paʼi rtsa ba don rnam par ṅes pa bźugs so.
author: Śes-rab-rgyal-mtshan,Mñam-med,1356-1415.

title: ʼDzam gliṅ Skyes-mchog Sen-̇chen Nor-bu-dgra-ʼdul gyi rnam par thar ba Mu tig phreṅ mdzes las, Rgya-gar chos rdzoṅ /Gu-ru-rgyal-mtshan gyis phab ; Mgo-log-khul Maṅ-tshogs Sgyu-rtsal Khaṅ Ge-sar Rtsom-źib-khaṅ gis bsgrigs.
Bod gaṅs can gyi skad kyi brda sprod paʼi phyi mo sum rtags gñis kyi don gsal bar ʼbrel ba blo gsar ʼjug paʼi sgo źes bya ba bźugs so /rtsom sgrig pa, Bkra-śis-zla-ba.
Mkhas grub kyi rtsom rig dpyad brjod bdams sgrig /[rtsom sgrig pa, Mkhas-grub ; rtsom sgrig pa gan khur ba, Bkra-sis-dṅos-grub].
Gnam sa go ʼbyed /Źogs-duṅ.
author: Źogs-duṅ.

title: Chab-ʼgag Rdo-rje-tshe-riṅ gi ched rtsom phyogs sgrig.
author: Rdo-rje-tshe-riṅ,Chab-ʼgag.

title: Gsuṅ ṅag rin po che lam ʼbras bu daṅ bcas paʼi khrid rim sñiṅ poʼi legs bśad bźugs so /Paṇ-chen Ṅag-dbaṅ-chos-grags kyis brtsams ; Dpal-brtsegs Bod-yig Dpe-rñiṅ Źib-ʼjug-khaṅ nas bsgrigs.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-chos-grags,1572-1641.

title: Bla med Rdzogs-pa-chen-poʼi bkaʼ sems smad sde dguʼi skor bźugs so.
A khrid thun mtshams bco lṅa pa ma bu cha lag daṅ bcas pa bźugs so /Bru-chen Rgyal-ba Gʼyuṅ-druṅ nas mdzad ; Gʼyuṅ-druṅ Gtsug-gśen-rnam-rgyal nas bsgrigs.
author: Bru-sgom Rgyal-ba-gʼyung-drung,1242-1290.

title: Gaṅs dkar Ti-se daṅ Ma-pham Gʼyu-mtshoʼi gnas yig /rtsom sgrig pa, Chos-ṅag ; ʼjus ʼgod pa, Bstan-ʼdzin-nor-bu, Liʼu-yus-can.
Bod-gzuṅ Zlos-gar Tshogs-paʼi lo rgyus kun bzaṅ źiṅ gi mchod sprin mig yid rna baʼi dgaʼ ston /Be-ri Dge-bśes ʼJigs-med-dbaṅ-rgyal gyis brtsams.
pub: Dharamsala :Tibetan Institute of Performing Arts & Tibet Writes,2010.
author: ʼJigs-med-dbaṅ-rgyal,Be-ri,1966-

title: Skyor-mo luṅ gi khrab gźuṅ dwaṅs śel me loṅ :bram ze ma Gzugs-ky-ñi-ma, mkhaʼ ʼgro ma ʼGro-ba Bzaṅ-mo, khyeʼu Padma-ʼod-ʼbar.
pub: Dharamsala :Tibetan Institute of Performing Arts & Tibet Writes,2010.

title: Grub mthaʼ sñiṅ po kun las btus pa luṅ rigs sñe ma źes bya ba bźugs so /Slob-dpon Sems-pa-rdo-rje.
pub: Kalimpong, Darjeeling, W.B. :Ka-sbug Śrīdiwākar dpe skrun khaṅ,c2010.
author: Sempā Dorje.

title: Gʹyu-khog Bla-ma Bya-bral Chos-dbyiṅs-raṅ-grol gyi gsuṅ ʼbum bźugs.
author: Chos-dbyiṅs-raṅ-grol,Bya-bral Rin-po-che,1872-1952.

title: 880-01Bod kyi srol rgyun bdaʼ rtsed rig gnas /gtso sgrig pa, Gcod-pa Don-grub =Zangzu chuan tong she jian wen hua / [Jiaoba Dongzhu zhu bian].
Rtsa baʼi bla mar sgro skur gyis dmaʼ ʼbebs gtoṅ mkhan la chos pa tshos kyaṅ bzod sgom byed mi ʼos pa.
pub: Dharamsala, Kangra, H.P. :Śes-bya kun-ʼdus rtsom-sgrig lte-gnas/Multi-Education Editing Center,2010.

title: Bod kyi gso ba rig paʼi sman daṅ sman sbyor tshad ldan gyi rtsa ʼdzin sgrig gźi :btsan byol Bod miʼi Bod kyi gso ba rig paʼi sman paʼi lhan tshogs kyi khrims yig don tshan dbu paʼi nan gses "kha" paʼi ʼog bkod sgrig byas = Est. under section 9 (b) of Central Council of Tibetan Medicine Act. 2003.
pub: Dharamsala, Distt. Kangra, H.P. :Bstan-byol Bod-miʼi Bod-kyi Gso-ba Rig-paʼi Ches-mthoʼi Sman-paʼi Lhan-tshogs,2010.

title: ʼDzam gliṅ skyes mchog Sen-̇chen Nor-bu-gra-ʼdul gyi rnam par thar ba mu tig phreṅ mdzes las.Li khriʼi rta rdzoṅ /Gu-ru-rgyal-mtshan gyis phab ; Mgo-log-khul Maṅ-tshogs Sgyu-rtsal Khaṅ, Ge-sar Rtsom-źib Khaṅ gis bsgrigs.
Bod miʼi źi baʼi gyen laṅs daṅ gźuṅ maṅ btsan byol du ʼbyor nas mi lo lṅa bcu ʼkhor baʼi bgro gleṅ ched rtsom phyogs bsgrigs.
pub: Sarah, Dharamsala, Dist. Kangra, H.P. :Sa-rā Bod-kyi Mtho-rim Slob-gñer-khaṅ,c2010.

title: Slob dpon saṅs rgyas gñis pa Padma-ʼbyuṅ-gnas kyi rnam thar yid kyi mun sel źes bya ba bźugs so /[ʼtsho bsdu legs sgrig, Blo-gros-rgya-mtsho ; rtsom sgrig ʼgan ʼkhur ba, Don-grub-phun-tshogs].
Btsan gnon ʼog gi Bod mi /Lha-phrug gis brtsams.
author: Lha-phrug.

title: Bod rig paʼi skor gyi rtsom yig thor bu /Śar-yul Phun-tshogs-tshe-riṅ gis brtsams.
author: Phun-tshogs-tshe-riṅ.

title: Sum cu baʼi sñiṅ don legs bśad ljon paʼi dbaṅ boʼi tshig don ʼgrel ba blo gsar rig sgo ʼbyed paʼi lde mig /Śis-tshaṅ Mkhyen-rab-rgya-mtshos brtsams.
author: Mkhyen-rab-rgya-mtsho,Śis-tshaṅ.

title: Lo-chuṅ Gdoṅ-len Ru-khag gi ʼod stoṅ ʼphro baʼi lam bu /[dpe sgrig ʼgan ʼkhur ba, Karma-tshe-riṅ].
pub: [Chengdu] :Si-khron dpe skrun tshogs pa, Si-khron mi rigs dpe skrun khaṅ,2010.

title: Sṅa-ʼgyur Rgyal-ba Dpal-yul-baʼi Ri chos gsum gyi khrid yig bźugs /[Gnam-chos Mi-ʼgyur-rdo-rje daṅ Kun-bzaṅ-śes-rab kyis mdzad].
Lab Dgaʼ-ldan Mdo-sṅags Bśad-sgrub ʼPhel-rgyas-gliṅ gi byuṅ ba brjod pa gyaṅ chags bkra śis ra ba źes bya bźugs so /Lab-phan-ʼdum Blo-bzaṅ-blo-gros kyis brtsams.
pub: Pe-cin :Kruṅ-goʼi Bod śes rig dpe skrun khaṅ,2010-
author: Legs-bśad-tshaṅs-pa-bźad-paʼi-blo-gros,1958-

title: Rdzogs-pa chen po mu med bdal paʼi gźuṅ ʼgrel skor daṅ kun bzaṅ a gsal ñams len lṅa skor man ṅag ces paʼi gnad don bźi pa bcas bźugs /[Sprul-sku Se-gñen-źig-po daṅ ʼGro-mgon Blo-gros-rgyal-mtshan].
author: Se-gñen-źig-po,Sprul-sku.

title: Rba bźed phyogs bsgrigs /Bde-skyid kyis bsgrigs.
Bkaʼ gter chos skyoṅ rigs bsdus smin gliṅ skoṅ gso dṅos grub rol mtsho bźugs so =Bkaʼ gter chos skyong rigs bdus smin gling skong gso dngos grub rol mtsho bzhugs so.
Bkaʼ gter gñis ʼdus Smin-gliṅ rdor sems kyi sgrub skor chos tshan bźugs so =Bka gter gnyis ʼdus Smin-gling rdor sems kyi sgrubs skor chos tshan.
Gter-chen Padma-gliṅ-paʼi gter byon rtsa gsum chos sruṅ daṅ bcas paʼi sgrub thabs gces btus bźugs so.
author: Padma-gliṅ-pa,Gter-ston,1450?-

title: Bse-tshaṅ Blo-bzaṅ-dpal-ldan gyi gsuṅ ʼbum bźugs so /Bse-tshaṅ Blo-bzaṅ-dpal-ldan gyis brtsams.
author: Blo-bzaṅ-dpal-ldan,Bse-tshaṅ.

title: Mṅon par ʼbyuṅ baʼi mdo :Ston pa Śākya-thub-paʼi rnam par thar.
Don bdun cu daṅ rten ʼgrel skor bźugs so /Kun-mkhyen Legs-pa-don-grub.
pub: [Bylakuppe, Dist. Mysore, Karnataka State] :Gdan-sa Bkra-śis-lhun-poʼi Dpe-mdzod-khaṅ,2009.
author: Chos-ʼbyor-dpal-bzang,active 15th century.

title: Rab gsal ʼphrul gyi me loṅ /Tre-hor Zla-ba-tshe-riṅ gis brtsams.
Mdo-smad Mgo-log Dbal-śul Gser-rtaʼi lo rgyus gser ʼbroṅ ri smyug poʼi brjid ñams kyi gsal byed luṅ rigs gzi ʼbar kun phan ñi maʼi snaṅ ba źes bya ba bźugs so /Gser-rtaʼi Tshul-khrims-ʼod-zer.
author: Tshul-khrims,Gser-rta,1974-

title: ʼGul ʼdod pai lce :mi rigs daṅ spyi tshogs kyi dge skyon la gźigs paʼi bsam tshul lhug brjod /Śis-tshaṅ lJaṅ-myug gis brtsams.

Bod gaṅs can ljoṅs kyi gnaʼ boʼi srol rgyun gyi sgyu rtsal naṅ ma daṅ stod gźas gṅis gsar gtod mdzad mkhan Rdo-riṅ Paṇḍi-ta Bstan-ʼdzin-dpal-byor lags kyi sku tsheʼi lo rgyus daṅ gźas tshigs phyogs bsdus dgaʼ baʼi glu dbyaṅs źes bya ba bźugs so /Phun-rab-pa Bstan-ʼdzin-dpag-bsam gyis rtsom sgrig byas.
pub: [Dharamsala] :Thaṅ-stoṅ Glu-sgar Tshogs-pa nas ʼgrems spel źus,2010.

title: Gsaṅ mi thub paʼi gsaṅ ba :Rgya-nag gis Bod źi bas bciṅs ʼgrol zer baʼi bsgrags gtam ʼog mi lo lṅa bcuʼi mun nag gi bden dpaṅ = The secrets that can never be hidden : revealing the truths behind 50 years of darkness under China's "Peaceful liberation" of Tibet /Spo-chuṅ-tshaṅ Don-grub Lha-dar gyis brtsam.
pub: Dharamsala, Distt. Kangra, H.P. :Bod-smyug "TibetWrites" dpe skrun khaṅ nas dpar du bskrun,2009.
author: Don-grub Lha-dar,Spo-chuṅ Tshaṅ.

title: Btsan byol Bod miʼi gźis chags khag gi lo rgyus /phyogs sgrig pa, Sgo-maṅ Skal-bzaṅ-rdo-rje, Śa-braṅ Blo-bzaṅ-bstan-pa, Sa-mdaʼ Bsam-dkyil-dbaṅ-rgyal ; źu sgrig, Byams-pa-bstan-ʼdzin].

Sgrub brgyud Karma Kam-tshaṅ brgyud pa rin po cheʼi rnam par thar pa rab ʼbyams nor bu chu śel gyi phreṅ ba kha skoṅ bcas bźugs so /Si-tu sku phreṅ brgyad pa Chos-kyi-ʼbyuṅ-gnas, Be-lo Tshe-dbaṅ-kun-khyab, Stobs-dgaʼ-gʼyu-rgyal.
author: Si-tu Paṇ-chen Chos-kyi-ʼbyuṅ-gnas,1699 or 1700-1774.

title: Bod kyi tshig mdzod chen mo /rtsom sgrig pa, Ṅam-riṅ Blo-bzaṅ-bstan-dar.
author: Blo-bzaṅ-bstan-dar,Ṅam-riṅ.

title: Sa mthoʼi bu mo.
pub: [Pe-cin] :Kruṅ-goʼi Bod rig pa dpe skrun khaṅ,2008-

title: Bod-ljoṅs mdzes paʼi rgyan mchog Se-ra Theg-chen-gliṅ gi ya gyal Ser-byes Mkhas-sñan Grwa-tshaṅ gi chos ʼbyuṅ gdan rabs gsal baʼi legs bśad rta bdun bdag poʼi ʼod zer źes bya ba bźugs so /Ser-tre Lha-rams Dge-bśes Tshul-khrims-chos-ʼphel gyis brtsams.
pub: Bylakuppe, Dist. Mysore, Karnataka State :Ser-byes Dpe-mdzod-khaṅ gis ʼgrems spel źus,2010.
author: Tshul-khrims-chos-ʼphel,Tre-hor Lha-rams Dge-bśes,1940-

title: Bsdus grwaʼi skor bźugs so /Kun-mkhyen Legs-pa-don-grub.
pub: [Bylakuppe, Dist. Mysore, Karnataka State] :Gdan-sa Bkra-śis-lhun-poʼi Dpe-mdzod-khaṅ,2009.
author: Chos-ʼbyor-dpal-bzang,active 15th century.

title: Mkhas paʼi dbaṅ po ʼJam-dbyaṅs Śanti-a Blo-gros-rgyal-mtshan gyis mdzad paʼi phar phyin zur bkol rnam bśad zes bya ba bźugs so /ʼJam-dbyaṅs Śanti-pa Blo-gros-rgyal-mtshan.
pub: Bylakupee, Dist. Mysore, Karnataka State :Bkra-śis-lhun-poʼi Dpe-mdzod-khaṅ,2010.
author: Blo-gros-rgyal-mtshan,Śānti-pa,active 15th century.

title: Ris med bstan pa rgyas paʼi ʼod snaṅ źes bya ba bźugs so :ris med bgro gleṅ deb daṅ po /rtsom pa po, ris med mkhan slob dge bśes.
pub: [Bylakuppe, Dist. Mysore, South Karnataka] :Gñaʼ-khri Chos-rig Źabs-źu Ris-med Bod-kyi Dpe-mdzod-khaṅ,2010.

title: Legs bśad sñiṅ poʼi bkaʼ ʼgrel bstan paʼi sgron me bźugs so /Gñal-ston Dpal-ʼbyor-lhun-grub kyis mdzad.
pub: Bylakupee, Dist. Mysore, Karnataka State :Ser-byes Dpe-mdzod-khaṅ,2009.
author: Dpal-ʼbyor-lhun-grub,Gñal-ston.

title: Draṅ ṅes rnam ʼbyed kyi spyi don mthaʼ dpyod legs par bśad pa blo gsal mgul rgyan ; daṅ, Dbu maʼi bstan bcos Zla-grags dgoṅs rgyan rin po cheʼi phreṅ ba źes bya ba bźugs so /Paṇ-chen Bde-legs-ñi-mas mdzad.
author: Bde-legs-ñi-ma,Paṇ-chen,active 16th century.

title: Dbu maʼi zin tho zla baʼi dgoṅs rgyan bźugs so /Ser-byes Tre-hor Dge-bśes ʼPhrin-las-rdo-rje.
author: ʼPhrin-las-rdo-rje,Ser-byes Tre-hor Dge-bśes,1939-1994.

title: Bdag ñid chen po Klu-sgrub źabs kyis mdzad paʼi sgrub thabs mdor byas ;daṅ, Dpal rim pa lṅa pa bźugs so /ñams źib phyogs sgrig pa, Rgyal-mtshan-rnam-grol.
pub: Sarnatha, Varanasi :Wā-ṇa dbus Bod kyi ches mthoʼi gtsug lag slob gñer khaṅ,2010.
author: Nāgārjuna,active 8th century.

title: Phan yon phyogs sgrig legs tshogs sgo ʼbyed ces bya ba bźugs so.
pub: Bylakuppe, Dist. Mysore, Karnataka State :Sṅa-ʼgyur Rig-mdzod Rtsis-ʼphrul Sde-tshan,2010.

pub: [Chengdu] :Si-khron dpe skrun tshogs pa, Si-khron mi rigs dpe skrun khaṅ,2009.
author: Dge-ʼdun-chos-ʼphel,A-mdo,1903-1951.

title: Spyi nor goṅ sa skyab mgon chen po mchog nas stsal baʼi Kun-bzaṅ bla maʼi źal luṅ sṅon ʼgroʼi gsuṅ chos thar lam gsal baʼi sgron me źes bya ba bźugs so /yig ʼbeb źu ba po, Rnam-grwa Thub-bstan-yar-ʼphel.
pub: Dharamsala :Sku-bcar Rnam-pa-rgyal-na Phan-bde Legs-bśad-gliṅ Grwa-tshaṅ gi Śes-yon Lhan-tshogs nas dpar skrun daṅ ʼgrems spel źus,2010.
author: Bstan-ʼdzin-rgya-mtsho,Dalai Lama XIV,1935-

pub: [Chʻengtu] :Si-khron dpe tshogs pa, Si-khron mi rigs dpe skrun khaṅ,2005.
author: Dge-ʼdun,Źu-chen-pa.

pub: Bylakuppe, Dist. Mysore, Karnataka State :Sṅa-ʼgyur Mtho-slob Mdo-sṅag Rig-paʼi-ʼbyuṅ-gnas Gliṅ, Sṅa-ʼgyur Rig-mdzod Rtsis-ʼphrul Sde-tshan nas par bskrun źus,2010.
author: Penor RinpocheIII,1932-2009.

title: Rgyal dbaṅ dpal yul baʼi gdan rabs ṅo mthsar ʼchi med yoṅs ʼduʼi ljon paʼi phreṅ ba źes bya ba bźugs so /ʼJam-dpal-bzaṅ-po.
pub: Bylakuppe, Dist. Mysore, Karnataka State :Sṅa-ʼgyur Rig-mdzod Rtsis-ʼphrul Sde-tshan nas dpar bskrun źus,2010.
author: Tshe-riṅ Bla-ma ʼJam-dpal-bzaṅ-po,Rmugs-saṅs,1900 or 1901-

title: Rnal ʼbyor gyi dbaṅ phyug grub chen khro zur rgyal sras Rdo-rje-bdud-ʼdul rin po cheʼi ʼdas log mthoṅ ba don ldan źes bya ba bźugs so /[Mkhan-po Bśad-sgrub-bstan-ʼdzin nas brtsams ; ʼdas log Jo-bo Bkra-śis-rab-brtan gyi gsuṅ].
pub: Kathmandu :Vajra Publications :ʼPhags pa Śiṅ-kun Śrī Gau-tam Buddha Wi-ha-raʼi gsuṅ rab rgyun spel khaṅ nas chos sbyin du spel,2010.

title: Mkhas paʼi dbaṅ po rje Rta-nag Dge-ʼdun-blo-bzaṅ gis mdzad paʼi thun mon bsdus grwaʼi rnam bśad legs pa bźugs so /Rje-rta-nag Dge-ʼdun-blo-bzaṅ.
pub: Bylakuppe, Dist. Mysore, Karnataka State :Bkra-śis-lhun-poʼi Dpe-mdzod-khaṅ,2009.
author: Dge-ʼdun-blo-bzaṅ,Rta-nag-pa.

title: Sṅa-ʼgyur Mtho-slob chen moʼi dbyar gnas skabs kyi dgoṅ moʼi źal don phyogs bsgrigs bźugs so =Collection of summer-abode prayers.
pub: Bylakuppe, Dist. Mysore, Karnataka State :Sṅa-ʼgyur Mtho-slob Mdo-sṅag Rig-paʼi-ʼbyuṅ-gnas Gliṅ, Sṅa-ʼgyur Rig-mdzod Rtsis-ʼphrul Sde-tshan,2010.

title: Sum rtags rtsa ʼgrel kyi rnam bśad Thon-miʼi dgoṅs pa rab tu gsal baʼi snaṅ byed ;daṅ, Sñan ṅag me loṅ gźuṅ gi dgoṅs don dbyaṅs can dgaʼ skyed ces bya ba bźugs so /Dkaʼ-chen Blo-bzaṅ-bzod-pas mdzad pa.
author: Blo-bzaṅ-bzod-pa,Khrig-tse Dkaʼ-chen,1922-1995.

title: Dpyid kyi pho ñaʼi gre ʼgyur /[źug dag daṅ lag ltar rtsom sgrig pa, Thub-bstan-tshe-riṅ, Ṅag-dbaṅ-phun-tshogs, Bsod-nams-tshe-riṅ].

title: Tshad maʼi rigs lam byis paʼi gar stegs /Thub-bstan-phun-tshogs kyis rtsom sgrig byas.
Bod btsan poʼi lo rgyus daṅ ʼbrel baʼi mthaʼ dpyod gces bsdus /Cha-ris Skal-bzaṅ-thogs-med kyis sgrig sgyur byas.

Gaṅs Ti-se Bon gźuṅ rig mdzod dpe tshogs legs grub kyi dran rten zin tho /gtso gñer sde khag, Rtse-źig Gʹyuṅ-druṅ Bon Bstan-ʼphel-rgyas-gliṅ ; spyi khyab ʼgan ʼdzin pa, Rtse-źig-tshaṅ Śes-rab-bstan-paʼi-zla-ba ; gtso sgrig pa, Stoṅ-skor Tshe-riṅ-thar ; rtsom sgrig pa, Tshul-khrims-bstan-pa-ʼbrug-grags, Khri-bsod-bstan.
Bod kyi srol rgyun ʼtshem buʼi śes bya rlabs kyi phreṅ ba /[rtsom sgrig ʼgan khur ba, Bstan-ʼdzin-phun-tshogs].
Bod kyi srol rgyun śin bzoʼi śes bya rtswa thog zil pa /[rtsom sgrig ʼgan khur ba, Bstan-ʼdzin-phun-tshogs].
Sñan ṅag legs bśad gter ʼbum /Rdo-dgon Gsaṅ-bdag-rdo-rjes brtsams.

title: Lam ʾbras bu daṅ bcas paʾi gdams ṅag gi gźun śiṅ rgyas pa gźun ji lta ba bźin bkri baʾi lam gyi dṅos gźiʾi khrid yig Rgyud gsum mdzes par byed paʾi rgyan źes bya ba bźugs so /[Dkon-mchog-lhun-grub kyis sbyar]
author: Dkon-mchog-lhun-grub,Ṅor-chen,1497-1557.

title: Yid bźin mdzod kyi don khrid Zab don Rdo rje sñiṅ po /[Dri-med-ʾod-zer gyis bkod]
author: Kloṅ-chen-pa Dri-med-ʾod-zer,1308-1363.

title: Bstan pa la ʼjug paʼi sgo dam pa Skyabs ʼgroʼi bslab bya daṅ Ltuṅ ba sde lṅaʼi mdo źes bya ba sogs bźugs so.
ʾDus pa rin po cheʾi rgyud dri ma med pa Gzi brjid rab tu ʾbar baʾi mdo źes bya bźugs so.
Dpal Gsaṅ baʾi sñiṅ po de kho na ñid ṅes paʾi rgyud kyi ʾgrel pa Phyogs bcuʾi mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba źes bya ba bźugs so /[Rdo-rje-gzi-brjid kyis sbyar]
author: Kloṅ-chen-pa Dri-med-ʾod-zer,1308-1363.

title: Bsaṅ gsur gyi cho ga mdor rgyas zab don sñiṅ mdzod Phrin las dpal ster ces bya ba bźugs so /[Ṅag-dbaṅ-kun-dgaʾ-bstan-ʾdzin gyis bris]
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-kun-dgaʼ-bstan-ʼdzin,Khams-sprul III,1680-1728.

title: Yid bźin mdzod kyi sa bcad bsdus sdom Ku mu daʾi phreṅ ba bźugs so /[Mañdzu-gho-ṣa-bi-dza-yas bris]
author: Mi-pham-rgya-mtsho,ʾJam-mgon ʾJu,1846-1912.

title: Rdo-grub-pa Dam-chos źes pas gźan gyi zer sgros nas mkhas su re baʾi ʾkhyur nag de dag mi mkhas mtshan phud du kho raṅ nas bskul ba bźin ñams mtshar du bkod pa bźugs so :Dam chos doks sel ; removing Damchos' doubts /by Mi-Pham-Rinpoche.
author: Mi-pham-rgya-mtsho,ʾJam-mgon ʾJu,1846-1912.

title: yid bźin mdzod kyi grub mthaʾ /[mi-pham-rnam-rgyal-lo]
author: Mi-pham-rgya-mtsho,ʾJam-mgon ʾJu,1846-1912.

title: Bod kyi brda dag /[Tshe-dbaṅ-rnam-rgyal nas mtshams]
author: Tshe-dbaṅ-rnam-rgyal,Zas-gźis,approximately 1913-

title: Bod spyiʾi śes rig zlos gar bas Bod kyi chos rgyal Mṅaʾ-bdag Khri Ral gyi mdzad rnam khrab ston skabs bro gar gyi gźas tshig dgeʾo /[Ṅag-dbaṅ-mthu-stobs kyis phyogs bsgrigs]
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-mthu-stobs.

title: Dpal Nā-ro Mkhaʾ-spyod-dbaṅ-moʾi lam rim pa gñis kyi zab khrid ji ltar nos paʾi zin bris śin tu gsaṅ ba Gnas gsum mkhaʾ ʾgroʾi sñiṅ bcud ces bya ba bźugs so /[Pha-boṅ-kha-pa Bde-chen-sñiṅ-po-dpal-bzaṅ-pos źal sṅa nas bkod]
author: Pha-boṅ-kha-pa Byams-pa-bstan-ʾdzin-ʾphrin-las-rgya-mtsho,1878-1941.

title: Gsuṅ rab rnam dag chuʾi dri ma sel byed Nor bu ke ta keʾi tshig don la dogs dpyod sñan sgron du gsol ba Nor bu ke ta kaʾi byi dor źes bya ba bźugs so /[Ku-sā-li Dharma-badzras (Thuʾu-bkwan Chos-kyi-rdo-rje) sug bris su bgyis]
author: Blo-bzaṅ-chos-kyi-ñi-ma,Thuʾu-bkwan III,1737-1802.

title: Sri zlog Tsa kra bcu gsum paʾi gzuṅs źes bya ba bźugs so.
Yus-śyaʾ-kyiʾi Brjed thog Yaṅ tiʾi za ma tog =Tibetan guide to astrology /[Slob-dpon-chen-po Thaṅ-zan-tsaṅ gis bsdus]
So thar byaṅ sems gsaṅ sṅags gsum gyi sdom paʾi bslab bya Nor buʾi ʾod ʾphreṅ źes bya ba bźugs so /[Dge-bśes Tshe-dbaṅ-bsam-ʾgrub kyis mdzad]
author: Tshe-dbaṅ-bsam-ʾgrub.

title: Rnam bśad sñiṅ po rgyan bźugs so /[Dar-ma-rin-chen gyis sbyar ba rdzogs so]
author: Rgyal-tshab Dar-ma-rin-chen,1364-1432.

title: Dgaʾ ldan chos srid ma bźugs so.

Legs par bśad pa chu daṅ śiṅ gi bstan bcos brda don daṅ bcas bźugs so =Jalavr̥kṣam dr̥ṣṭānta sunīti śāstram = Chhu shing gi bstancho : a moral lessons [sic] illustrated with water, trees and plants /[Guṅ-thaṅ Bstan-sgron-mchog nas mdzad pa ; bstan-bchos rnam gñis kyi don ʾdi A-kyā Yoṅs-ʾdzin ... Dbyaṅs-can-dgaʾ-baʾi-blo-gros kyis mdzad pa ; Mthar-phyin pas slar yoṅ par du bskrun pa]
author: Guṅ-thaṅ Dkon-mchog-bstan-paʾi-sgron-me,1762-1823.

title: Lha ldan gtsug lag khaṅ gi dkar chag :a guide to the Great Temple of Lhasa /by Ṅag-dbaṅ Blo-bzaṅ Rgya-mtsho, the great 5th Dalai Lama ; edited and published by Ngawang Gelek Demo.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-blo-bzaṅ-rgya-mtsho,Dalai Lama V,1617-1682.

title: Hymns to Tārā /edited by Lokesh Chandra.
pub: New Delhi:International Academy of Indian Culture,[1967?]

title: Dpal ʾkhor lo sdom pa lhan cig skyes paʾi dkyil ʾkhor gyi cho ga byin rlabs bdud rtsiʾi gter bum :a method for the ritual of the mandala of the Cakrasamvara tantra /by Kun-gzigs-chos-kyi-snaṅ-ba, the 8th Rgyal-dbaṅ ʾBrug-pa.
author: Kun-gzigs-chos-kyi-snaṅ-ba,ʾBrug-chen VIII,1768-1822.

title: ʾDzam gliṅ dmag chen daṅ gñis skor gyi zin bris sgyu maʾi ʾkhor loźes bya ba.
author: Dze-smad Blo-bzaṅ-dpal-ldan,1927-

title: Gsol ʼdebs leʼu bdun ma :reverential petition to Padmasambhava said to have been concealed by Prince Mu-khri-btsan-po /rediscovered by gter-ston Bzaṅ-po-grags-pa and set down by Rig-ʼdzin Rgod-kyi-ldem-ʼphru-can.
author: Bzaṅ-po-grags-pa,gter-ston,14th century.

title: Sñan ṅag, ʼdod pa blo gsal gźon nu rnams la ñe bar mkho ba mṅon brjod pad dkar ʼphreṅ baźes bya ba bźugs so : Śabdavidya = A collection of synonyms /by Palkhang Lotsawa ; edited and published by G. Tharchin.
author: Dpal-khaṅ Ṅag-dbaṅ-chos-kyi-rgya-mtsho,active 16th century.

title: Lha bsaṅs rnam dag chos sku,O-rgyan-rin-po-ches mdzad paʾi bsaṅs chuṅ yid bźin nor bu, Dgra-lha rta thugs dkar po, Dṅul chuʾi ñin źag phrugs gcig naṅ gi bsaṅs yig, Sde-brgyad gser skyems bcas bźugs so.

ʾDzam gliṅ Ge-sar ʾphrul gyi rgyal poʾ i rtogs brjod las, phyi gliṅ ʾJar gyi rgyal khams btul baʾi gýul ʾgyed dpaʾ boʾi sñiṅ gi dgaʾ ston ṅo mtshar gtam gyi leʾu daṅ ʾbrel rdzoṅ gtsor gyur paʾi gýaṅ gter mdzod khaṅbźugs so.
pub: [Ka-sbug :Khu-nu mthar pyhin pas...me loṅ par khaṅ du par bskrun źus pa,1961]
author: Don-brgyud-ñi-ma,Khams-sprul VIII,1931-

title: Bzaṅ spyod smon lam :The Bhadracaryāpraṇidhāna translated into Tibetan.
Sman gźuṅ cha lag bco brgyad =Eighteen pars [sic] of the medical scridtue [sic] /Gʹyu-thog Yon-tan-mgon-pos mdzad pa.
author: Gʼyu-thog Yon-tan-mgon-po,active 11th century.

title: Ja chaṅ lha moʾi rtsod gleṅ bstan bcos bźugs so =The dispute between tea and beer /edited by ... G. Tharchin.
Legs par bśad pa rin po cheʾi gter źes bya ba bźugs /[Kun-dgaʾ-rgyal-mtshan Dpal-bzaṅ-po źes bya bas ... sbyar ba.
author: Sa-skya Paṇḍi-ta Kun-dgaʾ-rgyal-mtshan,1182-1251.

title: Mkhaʾ ʾgroʾi bu mo ʾGro ba bzaṅ moʾi rnam thar.
ʾPhȧgs yul gyi sñan ṅag mkhan Rgyal-baʾi-sdes mdzad paʾi Gźon nu drug gi rtogs pa brjod pa bźugs so.
author: Jayasena.

title: Thugs-rje-chen-po Źal-bcu-gcig-pa Dpal-mo lugs kyi sgrub thabs smyuṅ bar gnas paʾi cho ga daṅ deʾi Bla ma brgyud paʾi gsol ʾdebs bcas /[Skal-bzaṅ-rgya-mtshos sbyar ba.
author: Bskal-bzaṅ-rgya-mtsho,Dalai Lama VII,1708-1757.

title: Dri ma med paʾi bsags rgyud :Dam tshig thams cad kyi nams chag bskon baʾi lun, bsags pa thams cad kyi rgyud, dri ma med paʾi rgyal po ; a Nyingmapa Tantra.
Sdig bśags gser gyi spu gri :a Mahayana formula for confession and atonement.
A-phyiʾi gsol mchod ʾphrin las myur du ʾgugs paʾi lcags kyi bźugs so.
Dzñā na śa straṃ /Bdud-ʼjoms ʼJigs-bral-ye-śes-rdo-rje.
author: Bdud-ʼjoms ʼJigs-bral-ye-śes-rdo-rje,1904-1987.

title: Gaṅs ljoṅs rgyal bstan yoṅs rdzogs kyi phyi mo sṅa ʾgyur Rdo rje theg paʾi bstan pa rin po che ji ltar byuṅ baʾi tshul dag ciṅ gsal bar brjod pa Lha dbaṅ gýul las rgyal baʾi rṅa bo cheʾi sgra dbyaṅs źes bya ba bźugs so /[ʾJigs-bral-ye-śes-rdo-rje-dge-legs-rnam-par-rgyal-baʾi sde ... bgyis]
author: Bdud-ʾjoms ʾJigs-bral-ye-śes-rdo-rje,1904-1987.

title: ʾPhags pa Spyan ras gzigs kyi sgrub thabs mdor bsdus :a concise method for the propitiation of Avalokiteśvara /[by Ri-rdzoṅ Sras-sprul Blo-bzaṅ-tshul-khrims-chos-ʾphel.
author: Blo-bzaṅ-tshul-khrims-chos-ʾphel,Ri-rdzoṅ Sras-sprul,1860-1926?

title: Lha mchog srid gsum gyi bdag po Tshaṅs-pa-chen-poʼi gsol mchod gyi rim pa Don yod ʼphrul gyi źags pa źes bya ba bźugs so.

Goṅ-sa Skyabs-mgon-chen-po-mchog nas spyi lo 1961-62 gñis kyi gsum bcuʾi dus chen skabs bstsal baʾi gsuṅ bśad khag gñis daṅ Ma ʾoṅs paʾi Bod kyi rtsa khrims sñiṅ don gsal bsgrags bskyaṅs paʾi skor Bod ljoṅs chol gsum mi maṅ ser skya spyi nas sñan źu phul baʾi ṅo bśus.
author: Bstan-ʾdzin-rgya-mtsho,Dalai Lama XIV,1935-

title: Bya sprel gyi gtam brgyud bźugs so =the story of birds and monkeys /edited, printed and published by G. Tharchin.
Contents of two classical hippological treatises /Lokesh Chandra.
pub: New Delhi :[International Academy of Indian Culture],1964.
author: Lokesh Chandra.

title: Smon lam raṅ ʾbyuṅ kloṅ yaṅs /Ye-śes-grub-pa.
author: Ye-śes-grub-pa,Bde-chen-chos-ʾkhor Yoṅs-ʾdzin V,1781-1845.

title: ʾTsho byed las daṅ po pa la Ñe bar mkho baʾi zin tig gces par btus pa Bdud rtsiʾi thigs pa źes bya ba bźugs so /[Karma-ṅag-dbaṅ-yon-tan-rgya-mtsho-blo-gros-mthaʾ-yas-paʾi-sdes bris]
pub: [Dharamsala :Council of Religious Affairs of H.H. the Dalai Lama,1965]
author: Koṅ-sprul Blo-gros-mthaʾ-yas,1813-1899.

title: ʾOd gsal rdzogs pa chen poʾi khregs chod lta baʾi glu dbyaṅs sa lam ma lus myur du bgrod paʾi rtsal Idan Mkhaʾ ldiṅ gśog rlabs źes bya ba bźugs so /[Bya-btaṅ Tshogs-drug-raṅ-grol gyis smras]
author: Źabs-dkar Tshogs-drug-raṅ-grol,1781-1851.

title: Dpal-ldan Mi-rje Bkaʾ-druṅ Nor-naṅ-mchog nas brtsams mdzad mkhas rnams dgyes paʾi Yig bskur rnam gźag ces bya ba bźugs so :Tibetan letter-writer /by Shri Kadrung Norgye Nangpa.
author: Nor-rgyas-naṅ-pa Dbaṅ-ʾdus-tshe-riṅ.

title: Sñan ṅag gi lus rgyan skyon sel gsum gyi sdom tshig Rab gsal me loṅ źes bya ba bźugs so /[Dbyaṅs-can-dgaʾ-baʾi-blo-gros kyis bris]
author: Dbyaṅs-can-dgaʾ-baʾi-blo-gros,A-kya Yoṅs-ʾdzin.

title: Deṅ dus tshan rig paʾi lugs kyi Ñi zla skar gsum gyi rnam gźag bźugs :The sun, the moon and the stars.
Tshad ma rnam ʼgrel Legs par bśad pa źes bya ba /Thams-cad-mkhyen-pa Dge-ʼdun-grub kyis mdzad pa.
author: Dge-ʼdun-grub,Dalai Lama I,1391-1474.

title: Dge tshul phyir bcos :an introduction to Buddhist monastic discipline for novices.

Goṅ-sa Skyabs-mgon-chen-poʾi gsaṅ gsum la bsṅags paʾi rab tu byed pa :daṅ Bstan paʾi rtsa ba tshul khrims kyi bslab pa la gces spras bya rigs par gdams pa bźugs so /[Dze-smad Sprul-miṅ-pa Blo-bzaṅ-dpal-ldan-bstan-ʾdzin-yar-rgyas ... bris]
author: Dze-smad Blo-bzaṅ-dpal-ldan,1927-

title: Theg pa mthaʾ dag gi sñiṅ po Mdo tsam brjod pa Chos kyi sgo ʾbyed ces bya ba bźugs so /[ʾJam-dbyaṅs-mkhyen-brtseʾi Sprul-miṅ0ʾdzin Chos-kyi-blo-gros-pas bris]
author: ʾJam-dbyaṅs-chos-kyi-blo-gros,Mkhyen-brtse,1896-1959.

title: Bon-po tantra miscellany.
Kha-che Pha-luʾi ʾjig rten las ʾbras rtsis lugs kyi bslab bya bźugs so :Khache Phalu's teaching.
author: Kha-che Pha-lu.

title: Rdo-rje-śugs-ldan-rtsal gyi las tshogs /[Blo-bzaṅ-ye-śes-bstan-ʼdzin-rgya-mtsho ... sbyar]
author: Khri-byaṅ Blo-bzaṅ-ye-śes-bstan-ʼdzin-rgya-mtsho,1901-

title: The Mañjuśrī tradition and the Ženpa židel :parting from the four desires /translated from the Tibetan by Thutop Tulku and Ngawang Sonam Tenzin.
Tshe g ́yaṅ ʼgugs paʼi phrin las khrigs su bsdebs pa Tshe bsod ʼdod dguʼi dpal ster źes bya ba bźugs so /[Mkhyen-brtseʼi-dbaṅ-pos bris]
author: Mkhyen-brtseʼi-dbaṅ-po,ʼJam-dbyaṅs,1820-1892.

title: Mthun pa spun bźiʾi lo rgyus bźugs so =the story of the four harmonious brethren /translated from Tibetan into English by G. Tharchin.
Rgyal sras źe brgyad kyi brjed byaṅ bźugs pa legs so /[Wa-gindra-dhyā-nas bsgrigs]
author: Ngawang Samten.

title: ʾPhags pa phyogs bcuʾi mun pa rnam par sel /[O-rgyan-bstan-gñis-gliṅ-pa]
author: O-rgyan-bstan-gñis-gliṅ-pa,Gter-ston.

title: Skyes bu gsum gyis ñams su blaṅ baʼi byaṅ chub lam gyi rim pa ʼbriṅ po sa bcad kha skoṅ daṅ bcas pa bźugs so /[Tsoṅ-kha-pa Ble-bzaṅ-grags-pa-dpal gyis sbyar ; sa bcad gsar du phye ʼgod pa po ni Khri-byaṅ Skye-miṅ-pa Blo-bzaṅ-ye-śes-bstan-ʼdzin-rgya-mtshor ʾbod pas bgyis]
author: Tsoṅ-kha-pa Blo-bzaṅ-grags-pa,1357-1419.

title: Sñan ṅag gi mtshan ñid bsdus pa rtsom dpe daṅ bcas pa Sna tshogs utpa laʾi chun po źes bya ba bźugs :Tibetan poems /[Gños btsun rmoṅs pa Dharma śriʾi blo mtsho las ʾthon pa].
author: Smin-gliṅ Lo-chen Dharma-śrī,1654-1717.

title: Śes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin paʼi man ṅag gi bstan bcos mṅon par rtogs pa'i rgyan ʼgrel pa daṅ bcas paʼi rnam bśad sñiṅ po rgyan gyi don legs par bśad pa Yum don gsal baʼi sgron me bźugs so.
author: Bsod-nams-grags-pa,Paṇ-chen,1478-1554.

title: Bkaʾ brgyad Bde gśegs ʾdus pa sgrub skor :texts for the preparation rituals and performances of the ʾBri-guṅ Bkaʾ-brgyad practices /by Tshul-khrims-ʾbyuṅ-gnas and ʾBri-guṅ Rig-ʾdzin Chos-kyi-grags-pa.
The autobiography of ʾJaʾ-tshon-sñiṅ-po.
author: ʾJaʾ-tshon-sñiṅ-po,Gter-ston,1585-1656.

title: Źi khro dgȯns pa raṅ grol :a collection of rediscovered texts from the gter-ma of Karma-gliṅ-pa including the Bar do thos grol, often called the "Tibetan Book of the Dead" /edited and supplemented by Rig-ʼdzin Ñi-ma-grags-pa of Khams.
Źi khro dgoṅs pa raṅ grol /[Karma-gliṅ-pas gter nas gdan draṅs paʼo.

ʾPhags pa Bcu-gcig-źal Dpal-mo lugs kyi sgrub thabs daṅ ʾbrel baʾi smyuṅ bar gnas paʾi cho ga Gźan phan kun khyab ces bya bźugs so /[Karma-ṅag-dbaṅ-yon-tan-rgya-mtsho ʾam Blo-gros-mthaʾ-yas-paʾi-sdes ... sbyar ba.
author: Koṅ-sprul Blo-gros-mthaʾ-yas,1813-1899.

title: The collected works of Kun-mkhyen ʼJigs-med-gling-pa.
author: ʼJigs-med-gliṅ-pa Raṅ-byuṅ-rdo-rje,1729 or 1730-1798.

title: Gso rig bstan bcos mthaʾ dag gi sñiṅ po rnams phyogs gcig tu bsdus pa man ṅag rin chen ʾbyuṅ gnas :a treatise on Tibetan ayurvedic practice containing numerous instructions and medical formulae /by ʾJam-dpal-rdo-rje.
author: ʾJam-dpal-rdo-rje.

title: Rnam dag Bde chen źiṅ gi smon lam Rȧ-ga-a-syas mdzad bźugs sho.
author: Karma-chags-med,Gnas-mdo,1610-1678.

title: Gnam chos thugs kyi gter kha las, Bde-chen źiṅ du ʾpho baʾi gdams pa rgyas par sgrigs pa bźugs so /Ra-ga-a-syas sbyar ba.
author: Karma-chags-med,Gnas-mdo,1610-1678.

title: Gnam chos Bde chen źiṅ sgrub gyi dbaṅ ʾgrig chags su bkod pa bźugs so /[Rā-ga-a-syas bsgrigs pa.
author: Karma-chags-med,Gnas-mdo,1610-1678.

title: Theg paʾi mchog rin po cheʾi mdzod ces bya ba bźugs /[Kun-mkhyen Ṅag-gi-dbaṅ-pos mdzad]

title: Lam zab leʼu bdun ma bźugs so /[ʼChi-med-bstan-gñis Gʹyuṅ-druṅ-gliṅ-pa la dṅos grub thob]
author: Koṅ-sprul Blo-gros-mthaʼ-yas,1813-1899.

title: Rtsa gsum chos skyoṅ daṅ bcas pa la gtor ʾbul gyi rim pa khyer bde Rig ʾdzin dgaʾ ston ses bya ba bźugs so /[Karma-ṅag-dbaṅ-yon-tan-rgya-mtshos bris]
author: Koṅ-sprul Blo-gros-mthaʾ-yas,1813-1899.

title: Chos spyod kyi rim pa thar lam rab gsal źes bya ba bźugs so.
Record of teachings received :the gsan-yig of the Fifth Dalai Lama Ṅag-dbaṅ-blo-bzaṅ-rgya-mtsho.
author: Ṅag-dbaṅ-blo-bzaṅ-rgya-mtsho,Dalai Lama V,1617-1682.

title: Chu śiṅ gñis kyi bstan bcos :similes of trees and water /[Dkon-mchog-bstan-paʾi-sgron-mes bris]
author: Guṅ-thaṅ Dkon-mchog-bstan-paʾi-sgron-me,1762-1823.

title: ʾPhags-ma Sgrol-ma la gsol gdab mchod pa maṇḍal bźi par grags paʾi cho ga ʾDod don yid bźin sgrub paʾi ljon śiṅ bźugs /[Tshe-dbaṅ-nor-buʾm Dpaʾ-bo-don-grub-rdo-rjes brtsams]
author: Kaḥ-thog Tshe-dbaṅ-nor-bu,1698-1755.

title: Grub-thob Karma-chags-med la Gśin-rje Chos-kyi-rgyal-poʾi źal nas gsuṅs paʾi sdig bśags bźugs so.
author: Karma-chags-med,Gnas-mdo,1610-1678.

Gsol bdebs bar chad la msol? bzhugs so .Rta gzungs lnga bzhugs so . Klu 'bum dkar po bzhugs so . Dpal rdo rje sder mo'i gzungs zhes bya ba bzhugs so . Manjusrinamasa giti .'Phags pa'jam dpal gyi mtshan brjod pa.
Gdugs dkar mchog tu grub pa bzhugs.
